55#define DNS_CLIENT_MAGIC ISC_MAGIC('D', 'N', 'S', 'c')
56#define DNS_CLIENT_VALID(c) ISC_MAGIC_VALID(c, DNS_CLIENT_MAGIC)
57
58#define RCTX_MAGIC ISC_MAGIC('R', 'c', 't', 'x')
59#define RCTX_VALID(c) ISC_MAGIC_VALID(c, RCTX_MAGIC)
60
61#define REQCTX_MAGIC ISC_MAGIC('R', 'q', 'c', 'x')
62#define REQCTX_VALID(c) ISC_MAGIC_VALID(c, REQCTX_MAGIC)
63
64#define UCTX_MAGIC ISC_MAGIC('U', 'c', 't', 'x')
65#define UCTX_VALID(c) ISC_MAGIC_VALID(c, UCTX_MAGIC)

75/*%
76 * DNS client object
77 */
78struct dns_client {
79 /* Unlocked */
80 unsigned int magic;
81 unsigned int attributes;
82 isc_mutex_t lock;
83 isc_mem_t *mctx;
84 isc_appctx_t *actx;
85 isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr;
86 isc_task_t *task;
87 isc_socketmgr_t *socketmgr;
88 isc_timermgr_t *timermgr;
89 dns_dispatchmgr_t *dispatchmgr;
90 dns_dispatch_t *dispatchv4;
91 dns_dispatch_t *dispatchv6;
92
93 unsigned int update_timeout;
94 unsigned int update_udptimeout;
95 unsigned int update_udpretries;
96 unsigned int find_timeout;
97 unsigned int find_udpretries;
98
99 /* Locked */
100 unsigned int references;
101 dns_viewlist_t viewlist;
102 ISC_LIST(struct resctx) resctxs;
103 ISC_LIST(struct reqctx) reqctxs;
104 ISC_LIST(struct updatectx) updatectxs;
105};
106
107/*%
108 * Timeout/retry constants for dynamic update borrowed from nsupdate
109 */
110#define DEF_UPDATE_TIMEOUT 300
111#define MIN_UPDATE_TIMEOUT 30
112#define DEF_UPDATE_UDPTIMEOUT 3
113#define DEF_UPDATE_UDPRETRIES 3
114
115#define DEF_FIND_TIMEOUT 5
116#define DEF_FIND_UDPRETRIES 3
117
118#define DNS_CLIENTATTR_OWNCTX 0x01

120/*%
121 * Internal state for a single name resolution procedure
122 */
123typedef struct resctx {
124 /* Unlocked */
125 unsigned int magic;
126 isc_mutex_t lock;
127 dns_client_t *client;
128 bool want_dnssec;
129 bool want_validation;
130 bool want_cdflag;
131 bool want_tcp;
132
133 /* Locked */
134 ISC_LINK(struct resctx) link;
135 isc_task_t *task;
136 dns_view_t *view;
137 unsigned int restarts;
138 dns_fixedname_t name;
139 dns_rdatatype_t type;
140 dns_fetch_t *fetch;
141 dns_namelist_t namelist;
142 isc_result_t result;
143 dns_clientresevent_t *event;
144 bool canceled;
145 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
146 dns_rdataset_t *sigrdataset;
147} resctx_t;
148
149/*%
150 * Argument of an internal event for synchronous name resolution.
151 */
152typedef struct resarg {
153 /* Unlocked */
154 isc_appctx_t *actx;
155 dns_client_t *client;
156 isc_mutex_t lock;
157
158 /* Locked */
159 isc_result_t result;
160 isc_result_t vresult;
161 dns_namelist_t *namelist;
162 dns_clientrestrans_t *trans;
163 bool canceled;
164} resarg_t;
165
166/*%
167 * Internal state for a single DNS request
168 */
169typedef struct reqctx {
170 /* Unlocked */
171 unsigned int magic;
172 isc_mutex_t lock;
173 dns_client_t *client;
174 unsigned int parseoptions;
175
176 /* Locked */
177 ISC_LINK(struct reqctx) link;
178 bool canceled;
179 dns_tsigkey_t *tsigkey;
180 dns_request_t *request;
181 dns_clientreqevent_t *event;
182} reqctx_t;
183
184/*%
185 * Argument of an internal event for synchronous DNS request.
186 */
187typedef struct reqarg {
188 /* Unlocked */
189 isc_appctx_t *actx;
190 dns_client_t *client;
191 isc_mutex_t lock;
192
193 /* Locked */
194 isc_result_t result;
195 dns_clientreqtrans_t *trans;
196 bool canceled;
197} reqarg_t;
198
199/*%
200 * Argument of an internal event for synchronous name resolution.
201 */
202typedef struct updatearg {
203 /* Unlocked */
204 isc_appctx_t *actx;
205 dns_client_t *client;
206 isc_mutex_t lock;
207
208 /* Locked */
209 isc_result_t result;
210 dns_clientupdatetrans_t *trans;
211 bool canceled;
212} updatearg_t;
213
214/*%
215 * Internal state for a single dynamic update procedure
216 */
217typedef struct updatectx {
218 /* Unlocked */
219 unsigned int magic;
220 isc_mutex_t lock;
221 dns_client_t *client;
222 bool want_tcp;
223
224 /* Locked */
225 dns_request_t *updatereq;
226 dns_request_t *soareq;
227 dns_clientrestrans_t *restrans;
228 dns_clientrestrans_t *restrans2;
229 bool canceled;
230
231 /* Task Locked */
232 ISC_LINK(struct updatectx) link;
233 dns_clientupdatestate_t state;
234 dns_rdataclass_t rdclass;
235 dns_view_t *view;
236 dns_message_t *updatemsg;
237 dns_message_t *soaquery;
238 dns_clientupdateevent_t *event;
239 dns_tsigkey_t *tsigkey;
240 dst_key_t *sig0key;
241 dns_name_t *firstname;
242 dns_name_t soaqname;
243 dns_fixedname_t zonefname;
244 dns_name_t *zonename;
245 isc_sockaddrlist_t servers;
246 unsigned int nservers;
247 isc_sockaddr_t *currentserver;
248 struct updatectx *bp4;
249 struct updatectx *bp6;
250} updatectx_t;
