256/*
257 * Try honoring the operating system's preferred ephemeral port range.
258 */
259static isc_result_t
260setsourceports(isc_mem_t *mctx, dns_dispatchmgr_t *manager) {
261 isc_portset_t *v4portset = NULL, *v6portset = NULL;
262 in_port_t udpport_low, udpport_high;
263 isc_result_t result;
264
265 result = isc_portset_create(mctx, &v4portset);
266 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
267 goto cleanup;
268 }
269 result = isc_net_getudpportrange(AF_INET, &udpport_low, &udpport_high);
270 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
271 goto cleanup;
272 }
273 isc_portset_addrange(v4portset, udpport_low, udpport_high);
274
275 result = isc_portset_create(mctx, &v6portset);
276 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
277 goto cleanup;
278 }
279 result = isc_net_getudpportrange(AF_INET6, &udpport_low, &udpport_high);
280 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
281 goto cleanup;
282 }
283 isc_portset_addrange(v6portset, udpport_low, udpport_high);
284
285 result = dns_dispatchmgr_setavailports(manager, v4portset, v6portset);
286
287 cleanup:
288 if (v4portset != NULL) {
289 isc_portset_destroy(mctx, &v4portset);
290 }
291 if (v6portset != NULL) {
292 isc_portset_destroy(mctx, &v6portset);
293 }
294
295 return (result);
296}
297
298static isc_result_t
299getudpdispatch(int family, dns_dispatchmgr_t *dispatchmgr,
300 isc_socketmgr_t *socketmgr, isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr,
301 bool is_shared, dns_dispatch_t **dispp,
302 const isc_sockaddr_t *localaddr)
303{
304 unsigned int attrs, attrmask;
305 dns_dispatch_t *disp;
306 unsigned buffersize, maxbuffers, maxrequests, buckets, increment;
307 isc_result_t result;
308 isc_sockaddr_t anyaddr;
309
310 attrs = 0;
311 attrs |= DNS_DISPATCHATTR_UDP;
312 switch (family) {
313 case AF_INET:
314 attrs |= DNS_DISPATCHATTR_IPV4;
315 break;
316 case AF_INET6:
317 attrs |= DNS_DISPATCHATTR_IPV6;
318 break;
319 default:
320 INSIST(0);
321 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
322 }
323 attrmask = 0;
324 attrmask |= DNS_DISPATCHATTR_UDP;
325 attrmask |= DNS_DISPATCHATTR_TCP;
326 attrmask |= DNS_DISPATCHATTR_IPV4;
327 attrmask |= DNS_DISPATCHATTR_IPV6;
328
329 if (localaddr == NULL) {
330 isc_sockaddr_anyofpf(&anyaddr, family);
331 localaddr = &anyaddr;
332 }
333
334 buffersize = 4096;
335 maxbuffers = is_shared ? 1000 : 8;
336 maxrequests = 32768;
337 buckets = is_shared ? 16411 : 3;
338 increment = is_shared ? 16433 : 5;
339
340 disp = NULL;
341 result = dns_dispatch_getudp(dispatchmgr, socketmgr,
342 taskmgr, localaddr,
343 buffersize, maxbuffers, maxrequests,
344 buckets, increment,
345 attrs, attrmask, &disp);
346 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
347 *dispp = disp;
348
349 return (result);
350}
351
352static isc_result_t
353createview(isc_mem_t *mctx, dns_rdataclass_t rdclass,
354 unsigned int options, isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr,
355 unsigned int ntasks, isc_socketmgr_t *socketmgr,
356 isc_timermgr_t *timermgr, dns_dispatchmgr_t *dispatchmgr,
357 dns_dispatch_t *dispatchv4, dns_dispatch_t *dispatchv6,
358 dns_view_t **viewp)
359{
360 isc_result_t result;
361 dns_view_t *view = NULL;
362 const char *dbtype;
363
364 result = dns_view_create(mctx, rdclass, DNS_CLIENTVIEW_NAME, &view);
365 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
366 return (result);
367
368 /* Initialize view security roots */
369 result = dns_view_initsecroots(view, mctx);
370 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
371 dns_view_detach(&view);
372 return (result);
373 }
374
375 result = dns_view_createresolver(view, taskmgr, ntasks, 1,
376 socketmgr, timermgr, 0,
377 dispatchmgr, dispatchv4, dispatchv6);
378 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
379 dns_view_detach(&view);
380 return (result);
381 }
382
383 /*
384 * Set cache DB.
385 * XXX: it may be better if specific DB implementations can be
386 * specified via some configuration knob.
387 */
388 if ((options & DNS_CLIENTCREATEOPT_USECACHE) != 0)
389 dbtype = "rbt";
390 else
391 dbtype = "ecdb";
392 result = dns_db_create(mctx, dbtype, dns_rootname, dns_dbtype_cache,
393 rdclass, 0, NULL, &view->cachedb);
394 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
395 dns_view_detach(&view);
396 return (result);
397 }
398
399 *viewp = view;
400 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
401}
402
403isc_result_t
404dns_client_create(dns_client_t **clientp, unsigned int options) {
405 isc_result_t result;
406 isc_mem_t *mctx = NULL;
407 isc_appctx_t *actx = NULL;
408 isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr = NULL;
409 isc_socketmgr_t *socketmgr = NULL;
410 isc_timermgr_t *timermgr = NULL;
411#if 0
412 /* XXXMPA add debug logging support */
413 isc_log_t *lctx = NULL;
414 isc_logconfig_t *logconfig = NULL;
415 unsigned int logdebuglevel = 0;
416#endif
417
418 result = isc_mem_create(0, 0, &mctx);
419 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
420 return (result);
421 result = isc_appctx_create(mctx, &actx);
422 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
423 goto cleanup;
424 result = isc_app_ctxstart(actx);
425 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
426 goto cleanup;
427 result = isc_taskmgr_createinctx(mctx, actx, 1, 0, &taskmgr);
428 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
429 goto cleanup;
430 result = isc_socketmgr_createinctx(mctx, actx, &socketmgr);
431 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
432 goto cleanup;
433 result = isc_timermgr_createinctx(mctx, actx, &timermgr);
434 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
435 goto cleanup;
436#if 0
437 result = isc_log_create(mctx, &lctx, &logconfig);
438 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
439 goto cleanup;
440 isc_log_setcontext(lctx);
441 dns_log_init(lctx);
442 dns_log_setcontext(lctx);
443 result = isc_log_usechannel(logconfig, "default_debug", NULL, NULL);
444 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
445 goto cleanup;
446 isc_log_setdebuglevel(lctx, logdebuglevel);
447#endif
448 result = dns_client_createx(mctx, actx, taskmgr, socketmgr, timermgr,
449 options, clientp, NULL, NULL);
450 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
451 goto cleanup;
452
453 (*clientp)->attributes |= DNS_CLIENTATTR_OWNCTX;
454
455 /* client has its own reference to mctx, so we can detach it here */
456 isc_mem_detach(&mctx);
457
458 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
459
460 cleanup:
461 if (taskmgr != NULL)
462 isc_taskmgr_destroy(&taskmgr);
463 if (timermgr != NULL)
464 isc_timermgr_destroy(&timermgr);
465 if (socketmgr != NULL)
466 isc_socketmgr_destroy(&socketmgr);
467 if (actx != NULL)
468 isc_appctx_destroy(&actx);
469 isc_mem_detach(&mctx);
470
471 return (result);
472}
473
474isc_result_t
475dns_client_createx(isc_mem_t *mctx, isc_appctx_t *actx,
476 isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr, isc_socketmgr_t *socketmgr,
477 isc_timermgr_t *timermgr, unsigned int options,
478 dns_client_t **clientp, const isc_sockaddr_t *localaddr4,
479 const isc_sockaddr_t *localaddr6)
480{
481 dns_client_t *client;
482 isc_result_t result;
483 dns_dispatchmgr_t *dispatchmgr = NULL;
484 dns_dispatch_t *dispatchv4 = NULL;
485 dns_dispatch_t *dispatchv6 = NULL;
486 dns_view_t *view = NULL;
487
488 REQUIRE(mctx != NULL);
489 REQUIRE(taskmgr != NULL);
490 REQUIRE(timermgr != NULL);
491 REQUIRE(socketmgr != NULL);
492 REQUIRE(clientp != NULL && *clientp == NULL);
493
494 client = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*client));
495 if (client == NULL)
496 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
497
498 isc_mutex_init(&client->lock);
499
500 client->actx = actx;
501 client->taskmgr = taskmgr;
502 client->socketmgr = socketmgr;
503 client->timermgr = timermgr;
504
505 client->task = NULL;
506 result = isc_task_create(client->taskmgr, 0, &client->task);
507 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
508 goto cleanup;
509
510 result = dns_dispatchmgr_create(mctx, &dispatchmgr);
511 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
512 goto cleanup;
513 client->dispatchmgr = dispatchmgr;
514 (void)setsourceports(mctx, dispatchmgr);
515
516 /*
517 * If only one address family is specified, use it.
518 * If neither family is specified, or if both are, use both.
519 */
520 client->dispatchv4 = NULL;
521 if (localaddr4 != NULL || localaddr6 == NULL) {
522 result = getudpdispatch(AF_INET, dispatchmgr, socketmgr,
523 taskmgr, true,
524 &dispatchv4, localaddr4);
525 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
526 client->dispatchv4 = dispatchv4;
527 }
528
529 client->dispatchv6 = NULL;
530 if (localaddr6 != NULL || localaddr4 == NULL) {
531 result = getudpdispatch(AF_INET6, dispatchmgr, socketmgr,
532 taskmgr, true,
533 &dispatchv6, localaddr6);
534 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
535 client->dispatchv6 = dispatchv6;
536 }
537
538 /* We need at least one of the dispatchers */
539 if (dispatchv4 == NULL && dispatchv6 == NULL) {
540 INSIST(result != ISC_R_SUCCESS);
541 goto cleanup;
542 }
543
544 /* Create the default view for class IN */
545 result = createview(mctx, dns_rdataclass_in, options, taskmgr,
546 RESOLVER_NTASKS, socketmgr, timermgr,
547 dispatchmgr, dispatchv4, dispatchv6, &view);
548 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
549 goto cleanup;
550 ISC_LIST_INIT(client->viewlist);
551 ISC_LIST_APPEND(client->viewlist, view, link);
552
553 dns_view_freeze(view); /* too early? */
554
555 ISC_LIST_INIT(client->resctxs);
556 ISC_LIST_INIT(client->reqctxs);
557 ISC_LIST_INIT(client->updatectxs);
558
559 client->mctx = NULL;
560 isc_mem_attach(mctx, &client->mctx);
561
562 client->update_timeout = DEF_UPDATE_TIMEOUT;
563 client->update_udptimeout = DEF_UPDATE_UDPTIMEOUT;
564 client->update_udpretries = DEF_UPDATE_UDPRETRIES;
565 client->find_timeout = DEF_FIND_TIMEOUT;
566 client->find_udpretries = DEF_FIND_UDPRETRIES;
567 client->attributes = 0;
568
569 client->references = 1;
570 client->magic = DNS_CLIENT_MAGIC;
571
572 *clientp = client;
573
574 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
575
576 cleanup:
577 if (dispatchv4 != NULL)
578 dns_dispatch_detach(&dispatchv4);
579 if (dispatchv6 != NULL)
580 dns_dispatch_detach(&dispatchv6);
581 if (dispatchmgr != NULL)
582 dns_dispatchmgr_destroy(&dispatchmgr);
583 if (client->task != NULL)
584 isc_task_detach(&client->task);
585 isc_mem_put(mctx, client, sizeof(*client));
586
587 return (result);
588}
589
590static void
591destroyclient(dns_client_t **clientp) {
592 dns_client_t *client = *clientp;
593 dns_view_t *view;
594
595 while ((view = ISC_LIST_HEAD(client->viewlist)) != NULL) {
596 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(client->viewlist, view, link);
597 dns_view_detach(&view);
598 }
599
600 if (client->dispatchv4 != NULL)
601 dns_dispatch_detach(&client->dispatchv4);
602 if (client->dispatchv6 != NULL)
603 dns_dispatch_detach(&client->dispatchv6);
604
605 dns_dispatchmgr_destroy(&client->dispatchmgr);
606
607 isc_task_detach(&client->task);
608
609 /*
610 * If the client has created its own running environments,
611 * destroy them.
612 */
613 if ((client->attributes & DNS_CLIENTATTR_OWNCTX) != 0) {
614 isc_taskmgr_destroy(&client->taskmgr);
615 isc_timermgr_destroy(&client->timermgr);
616 isc_socketmgr_destroy(&client->socketmgr);
617
618 isc_app_ctxfinish(client->actx);
619 isc_appctx_destroy(&client->actx);
620 }
621
622 isc_mutex_destroy(&client->lock);
623 client->magic = 0;
624
625 isc_mem_putanddetach(&client->mctx, client, sizeof(*client));
626
627 *clientp = NULL;
628}
629
630void
631dns_client_destroy(dns_client_t **clientp) {
632 dns_client_t *client;
633 bool destroyok = false;
634
635 REQUIRE(clientp != NULL);
636 client = *clientp;
637 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
638
639 LOCK(&client->lock);
640 client->references--;
641 if (client->references == 0 && ISC_LIST_EMPTY(client->resctxs) &&
642 ISC_LIST_EMPTY(client->reqctxs) &&
643 ISC_LIST_EMPTY(client->updatectxs)) {
644 destroyok = true;
645 }
646 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
647
648 if (destroyok)
649 destroyclient(&client);
650
651 *clientp = NULL;
652}
653
654isc_result_t
655dns_client_setservers(dns_client_t *client, dns_rdataclass_t rdclass,
656 const dns_name_t *name_space, isc_sockaddrlist_t *addrs)
657{
658 isc_result_t result;
659 dns_view_t *view = NULL;
660
661 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
662 REQUIRE(addrs != NULL);
663
664 if (name_space == NULL)
665 name_space = dns_rootname;
666
667 LOCK(&client->lock);
668 result = dns_viewlist_find(&client->viewlist, DNS_CLIENTVIEW_NAME,
669 rdclass, &view);
670 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
671 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
672 return (result);
673 }
674 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
675
676 result = dns_fwdtable_add(view->fwdtable, name_space, addrs,
677 dns_fwdpolicy_only);
678
679 dns_view_detach(&view);
680
681 return (result);
682}
683
684isc_result_t
685dns_client_clearservers(dns_client_t *client, dns_rdataclass_t rdclass,
686 const dns_name_t *name_space)
687{
688 isc_result_t result;
689 dns_view_t *view = NULL;
690
691 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
692
693 if (name_space == NULL)
694 name_space = dns_rootname;
695
696 LOCK(&client->lock);
697 result = dns_viewlist_find(&client->viewlist, DNS_CLIENTVIEW_NAME,
698 rdclass, &view);
699 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
700 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
701 return (result);
702 }
703 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
704
705 result = dns_fwdtable_delete(view->fwdtable, name_space);
706
707 dns_view_detach(&view);
708
709 return (result);
710}
711
712isc_result_t
713dns_client_setdlv(dns_client_t *client, dns_rdataclass_t rdclass,
714 const char *dlvname)
715{
716 isc_result_t result;
717 isc_buffer_t b;
718 dns_view_t *view = NULL;
719
720 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
721
722 LOCK(&client->lock);
723 result = dns_viewlist_find(&client->viewlist, DNS_CLIENTVIEW_NAME,
724 rdclass, &view);
725 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
726 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
727 goto cleanup;
728
729 if (dlvname == NULL)
730 view->dlv = NULL;
731 else {
732 dns_name_t *newdlv;
733
734 isc_buffer_constinit(&b, dlvname, strlen(dlvname));
735 isc_buffer_add(&b, strlen(dlvname));
736 newdlv = dns_fixedname_name(&view->dlv_fixed);
737 result = dns_name_fromtext(newdlv, &b, dns_rootname,
738 DNS_NAME_DOWNCASE, NULL);
739 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
740 goto cleanup;
741
742 view->dlv = dns_fixedname_name(&view->dlv_fixed);
743 }
744
745 cleanup:
746 if (view != NULL)
747 dns_view_detach(&view);
748
749 return (result);
750}
751
752static isc_result_t
753getrdataset(isc_mem_t *mctx, dns_rdataset_t **rdatasetp) {
754 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
755
756 REQUIRE(mctx != NULL);
757 REQUIRE(rdatasetp != NULL && *rdatasetp == NULL);
758
759 rdataset = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*rdataset));
760 if (rdataset == NULL)
761 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
762
763 dns_rdataset_init(rdataset);
764
765 *rdatasetp = rdataset;
766
767 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
768}
769
770static void
771putrdataset(isc_mem_t *mctx, dns_rdataset_t **rdatasetp) {
772 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
773
774 REQUIRE(rdatasetp != NULL);
775 rdataset = *rdatasetp;
776 REQUIRE(rdataset != NULL);
777
778 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(rdataset))
779 dns_rdataset_disassociate(rdataset);
780
781 isc_mem_put(mctx, rdataset, sizeof(*rdataset));
782
783 *rdatasetp = NULL;
784}
785
786static void
787fetch_done(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
788 resctx_t *rctx = event->ev_arg;
789 dns_fetchevent_t *fevent;
790
791 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_FETCHDONE);
792 REQUIRE(RCTX_VALID(rctx));
793 REQUIRE(rctx->task == task);
794 fevent = (dns_fetchevent_t *)event;
795
796 client_resfind(rctx, fevent);
797}
798
799static inline isc_result_t
800start_fetch(resctx_t *rctx) {
801 isc_result_t result;
802 int fopts = 0;
803
804 /*
805 * The caller must be holding the rctx's lock.
806 */
807
808 REQUIRE(rctx->fetch == NULL);
809
810 if (!rctx->want_cdflag)
811 fopts |= DNS_FETCHOPT_NOCDFLAG;
812 if (!rctx->want_validation)
813 fopts |= DNS_FETCHOPT_NOVALIDATE;
814 if (rctx->want_tcp)
815 fopts |= DNS_FETCHOPT_TCP;
816
817 result = dns_resolver_createfetch(rctx->view->resolver,
818 dns_fixedname_name(&rctx->name),
819 rctx->type,
820 NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 0,
821 fopts, 0, NULL,
822 rctx->task, fetch_done, rctx,
823 rctx->rdataset,
824 rctx->sigrdataset,
825 &rctx->fetch);
826
827 return (result);
828}
829
830static isc_result_t
831view_find(resctx_t *rctx, dns_db_t **dbp, dns_dbnode_t **nodep,
832 dns_name_t *foundname)
833{
834 isc_result_t result;
835 dns_name_t *name = dns_fixedname_name(&rctx->name);
836 dns_rdatatype_t type;
837
838 if (rctx->type == dns_rdatatype_rrsig)
839 type = dns_rdatatype_any;
840 else
841 type = rctx->type;
842
843 result = dns_view_find(rctx->view, name, type, 0, 0, false,
844 false, dbp, nodep, foundname,
845 rctx->rdataset,
846 rctx->sigrdataset);
847
848 return (result);
849}
850
851static void
852client_resfind(resctx_t *rctx, dns_fetchevent_t *event) {
853 isc_mem_t *mctx;
854 isc_result_t tresult, result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
855 isc_result_t vresult = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
856 bool want_restart;
857 bool send_event = false;
858 dns_name_t *name, *prefix;
859 dns_fixedname_t foundname, fixed;
860 dns_rdataset_t *trdataset;
861 dns_rdata_t rdata = DNS_RDATA_INIT;
862 unsigned int nlabels;
863 int order;
864 dns_namereln_t namereln;
865 dns_rdata_cname_t cname;
866 dns_rdata_dname_t dname;
867
868 REQUIRE(RCTX_VALID(rctx));
869
870 LOCK(&rctx->lock);
871
872 mctx = rctx->view->mctx;
873
874 name = dns_fixedname_name(&rctx->name);
875
876 do {
877 dns_name_t *fname = NULL;
878 dns_name_t *ansname = NULL;
879 dns_db_t *db = NULL;
880 dns_dbnode_t *node = NULL;
881
882 rctx->restarts++;
883 want_restart = false;
884
885 if (event == NULL && !rctx->canceled) {
886 fname = dns_fixedname_initname(&foundname);
887 INSIST(!dns_rdataset_isassociated(rctx->rdataset));
888 INSIST(rctx->sigrdataset == NULL ||
889 !dns_rdataset_isassociated(rctx->sigrdataset));
890 result = view_find(rctx, &db, &node, fname);
891 if (result == ISC_R_NOTFOUND) {
892 /*
893 * We don't know anything about the name.
894 * Launch a fetch.
895 */
896 if (node != NULL) {
897 INSIST(db != NULL);
898 dns_db_detachnode(db, &node);
899 }
900 if (db != NULL)
901 dns_db_detach(&db);
902 result = start_fetch(rctx);
903 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
904 putrdataset(mctx, &rctx->rdataset);
905 if (rctx->sigrdataset != NULL)
906 putrdataset(mctx,
907 &rctx->sigrdataset);
908 send_event = true;
909 }
910 goto done;
911 }
912 } else {
913 INSIST(event != NULL);
914 INSIST(event->fetch == rctx->fetch);
915 dns_resolver_destroyfetch(&rctx->fetch);
916 db = event->db;
917 node = event->node;
918 result = event->result;
919 vresult = event->vresult;
920 fname = dns_fixedname_name(&event->foundname);
921 INSIST(event->rdataset == rctx->rdataset);
922 INSIST(event->sigrdataset == rctx->sigrdataset);
923 }
924
925 /*
926 * If we've been canceled, forget about the result.
927 */
928 if (rctx->canceled)
929 result = ISC_R_CANCELED;
930 else {
931 /*
932 * Otherwise, get some resource for copying the
933 * result.
934 */
935 ansname = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*ansname));
936 if (ansname == NULL)
937 tresult = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
938 else {
939 dns_name_t *aname;
940
941 aname = dns_fixedname_name(&rctx->name);
942 dns_name_init(ansname, NULL);
943 tresult = dns_name_dup(aname, mctx, ansname);
944 if (tresult != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
945 isc_mem_put(mctx, ansname,
946 sizeof(*ansname));
947 }
948 if (tresult != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
949 result = tresult;
950 }
951
952 switch (result) {
953 case ISC_R_SUCCESS:
954 send_event = true;
955 /*
956 * This case is handled in the main line below.
957 */
958 break;
959 case DNS_R_CNAME:
960 /*
961 * Add the CNAME to the answer list.
962 */
963 trdataset = rctx->rdataset;
964 ISC_LIST_APPEND(ansname->list, rctx->rdataset, link);
965 rctx->rdataset = NULL;
966 if (rctx->sigrdataset != NULL) {
967 ISC_LIST_APPEND(ansname->list,
968 rctx->sigrdataset, link);
969 rctx->sigrdataset = NULL;
970 }
971 ISC_LIST_APPEND(rctx->namelist, ansname, link);
972 ansname = NULL;
973
974 /*
975 * Copy the CNAME's target into the lookup's
976 * query name and start over.
977 */
978 tresult = dns_rdataset_first(trdataset);
979 if (tresult != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
980 goto done;
981 dns_rdataset_current(trdataset, &rdata);
982 tresult = dns_rdata_tostruct(&rdata, &cname, NULL);
983 dns_rdata_reset(&rdata);
984 if (tresult != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
985 goto done;
986 tresult = dns_name_copy(&cname.cname, name, NULL);
987 dns_rdata_freestruct(&cname);
988 if (tresult == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
989 want_restart = true;
990 else
991 result = tresult;
992 goto done;
993 case DNS_R_DNAME:
994 /*
995 * Add the DNAME to the answer list.
996 */
997 trdataset = rctx->rdataset;
998 ISC_LIST_APPEND(ansname->list, rctx->rdataset, link);
999 rctx->rdataset = NULL;
1000 if (rctx->sigrdataset != NULL) {
1001 ISC_LIST_APPEND(ansname->list,
1002 rctx->sigrdataset, link);
1003 rctx->sigrdataset = NULL;
1004 }
1005 ISC_LIST_APPEND(rctx->namelist, ansname, link);
1006 ansname = NULL;
1007
1008 namereln = dns_name_fullcompare(name, fname, &order,
1009 &nlabels);
1010 INSIST(namereln == dns_namereln_subdomain);
1011 /*
1012 * Get the target name of the DNAME.
1013 */
1014 tresult = dns_rdataset_first(trdataset);
1015 if (tresult != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1016 result = tresult;
1017 goto done;
1018 }
1019 dns_rdataset_current(trdataset, &rdata);
1020 tresult = dns_rdata_tostruct(&rdata, &dname, NULL);
1021 dns_rdata_reset(&rdata);
1022 if (tresult != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1023 result = tresult;
1024 goto done;
1025 }
1026 /*
1027 * Construct the new query name and start over.
1028 */
1029 prefix = dns_fixedname_initname(&fixed);
1030 dns_name_split(name, nlabels, prefix, NULL);
1031 tresult = dns_name_concatenate(prefix, &dname.dname,
1032 name, NULL);
1033 dns_rdata_freestruct(&dname);
1034 if (tresult == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1035 want_restart = true;
1036 else
1037 result = tresult;
1038 goto done;
1039 case DNS_R_NCACHENXDOMAIN:
1040 case DNS_R_NCACHENXRRSET:
1041 ISC_LIST_APPEND(ansname->list, rctx->rdataset, link);
1042 ISC_LIST_APPEND(rctx->namelist, ansname, link);
1043 ansname = NULL;
1044 rctx->rdataset = NULL;
1045 /* What about sigrdataset? */
1046 if (rctx->sigrdataset != NULL)
1047 putrdataset(mctx, &rctx->sigrdataset);
1048 send_event = true;
1049 goto done;
1050 default:
1051 if (rctx->rdataset != NULL)
1052 putrdataset(mctx, &rctx->rdataset);
1053 if (rctx->sigrdataset != NULL)
1054 putrdataset(mctx, &rctx->sigrdataset);
1055 send_event = true;
1056 goto done;
1057 }
1058
1059 if (rctx->type == dns_rdatatype_any) {
1060 int n = 0;
1061 dns_rdatasetiter_t *rdsiter = NULL;
1062
1063 tresult = dns_db_allrdatasets(db, node, NULL, 0,
1064 &rdsiter);
1065 if (tresult != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1066 result = tresult;
1067 goto done;
1068 }
1069
1070 tresult = dns_rdatasetiter_first(rdsiter);
1071 while (tresult == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1072 dns_rdatasetiter_current(rdsiter,
1073 rctx->rdataset);
1074 if (rctx->rdataset->type != 0) {
1075 ISC_LIST_APPEND(ansname->list,
1076 rctx->rdataset,
1077 link);
1078 n++;
1079 rctx->rdataset = NULL;
1080 } else {
1081 /*
1082 * We're not interested in this
1083 * rdataset.
1084 */
1085 dns_rdataset_disassociate(
1086 rctx->rdataset);
1087 }
1088 tresult = dns_rdatasetiter_next(rdsiter);
1089
1090 if (tresult == ISC_R_SUCCESS &&
1091 rctx->rdataset == NULL) {
1092 tresult = getrdataset(mctx,
1093 &rctx->rdataset);
1094 if (tresult != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1095 result = tresult;
1096 POST(result);
1097 break;
1098 }
1099 }
1100 }
1101 if (n == 0) {
1102 /*
1103 * We didn't match any rdatasets (which means
1104 * something went wrong in this
1105 * implementation).
1106 */
1107 result = DNS_R_SERVFAIL; /* better code? */
1108 POST(result);
1109 } else {
1110 ISC_LIST_APPEND(rctx->namelist, ansname, link);
1111 ansname = NULL;
1112 }
1113 dns_rdatasetiter_destroy(&rdsiter);
1114 if (tresult != ISC_R_NOMORE)
1115 result = DNS_R_SERVFAIL; /* ditto */
1116 else
1117 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
1118 goto done;
1119 } else {
1120 /*
1121 * This is the "normal" case -- an ordinary question
1122 * to which we've got the answer.
1123 */
1124 ISC_LIST_APPEND(ansname->list, rctx->rdataset, link);
1125 rctx->rdataset = NULL;
1126 if (rctx->sigrdataset != NULL) {
1127 ISC_LIST_APPEND(ansname->list,
1128 rctx->sigrdataset, link);
1129 rctx->sigrdataset = NULL;
1130 }
1131 ISC_LIST_APPEND(rctx->namelist, ansname, link);
1132 ansname = NULL;
1133 }
1134
1135 done:
1136 /*
1137 * Free temporary resources
1138 */
1139 if (ansname != NULL) {
1140 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
1141
1142 while ((rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(ansname->list))
1143 != NULL) {
1144 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(ansname->list, rdataset, link);
1145 putrdataset(mctx, &rdataset);
1146 }
1147 dns_name_free(ansname, mctx);
1148 isc_mem_put(mctx, ansname, sizeof(*ansname));
1149 }
1150
1151 if (node != NULL)
1152 dns_db_detachnode(db, &node);
1153 if (db != NULL)
1154 dns_db_detach(&db);
1155 if (event != NULL)
1156 isc_event_free(ISC_EVENT_PTR(&event));
1157
1158 /*
1159 * Limit the number of restarts.
1160 */
1161 if (want_restart && rctx->restarts == MAX_RESTARTS) {
1162 want_restart = false;
1163 result = ISC_R_QUOTA;
1164 send_event = true;
1165 }
1166
1167 /*
1168 * Prepare further find with new resources
1169 */
1170 if (want_restart) {
1171 INSIST(rctx->rdataset == NULL &&
1172 rctx->sigrdataset == NULL);
1173
1174 result = getrdataset(mctx, &rctx->rdataset);
1175 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && rctx->want_dnssec) {
1176 result = getrdataset(mctx, &rctx->sigrdataset);
1177 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1178 putrdataset(mctx, &rctx->rdataset);
1179 }
1180 }
1181
1182 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1183 want_restart = false;
1184 send_event = true;
1185 }
1186 }
1187 } while (want_restart);
1188
1189 if (send_event) {
1190 isc_task_t *task;
1191
1192 while ((name = ISC_LIST_HEAD(rctx->namelist)) != NULL) {
1193 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(rctx->namelist, name, link);
1194 ISC_LIST_APPEND(rctx->event->answerlist, name, link);
1195 }
1196
1197 rctx->event->result = result;
1198 rctx->event->vresult = vresult;
1199 task = rctx->event->ev_sender;
1200 rctx->event->ev_sender = rctx;
1201 isc_task_sendanddetach(&task, ISC_EVENT_PTR(&rctx->event));
1202 }
1203
1204 UNLOCK(&rctx->lock);
1205}
1206
1207static void
1208suspend(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
1209 isc_appctx_t *actx = event->ev_arg;
1210
1211 UNUSED(task);
1212
1213 isc_app_ctxsuspend(actx);
1214 isc_event_free(&event);
1215}
1216
1217static void
1218resolve_done(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
1219 resarg_t *resarg = event->ev_arg;
1220 dns_clientresevent_t *rev = (dns_clientresevent_t *)event;
1221 dns_name_t *name;
1222 isc_result_t result;
1223
1224 UNUSED(task);
1225
1226 LOCK(&resarg->lock);
1227
1228 resarg->result = rev->result;
1229 resarg->vresult = rev->vresult;
1230 while ((name = ISC_LIST_HEAD(rev->answerlist)) != NULL) {
1231 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(rev->answerlist, name, link);
1232 ISC_LIST_APPEND(*resarg->namelist, name, link);
1233 }
1234
1235 dns_client_destroyrestrans(&resarg->trans);
1236 isc_event_free(&event);
1237
1238 if (!resarg->canceled) {
1239 UNLOCK(&resarg->lock);
1240
1241 /*
1242 * We may or may not be running. isc__appctx_onrun will
1243 * fail if we are currently running otherwise we post a
1244 * action to call isc_app_ctxsuspend when we do start
1245 * running.
1246 */
1247 result = isc_app_ctxonrun(resarg->actx, resarg->client->mctx,
1248 task, suspend, resarg->actx);
1249 if (result == ISC_R_ALREADYRUNNING)
1250 isc_app_ctxsuspend(resarg->actx);
1251 } else {
1252 /*
1253 * We have already exited from the loop (due to some
1254 * unexpected event). Just clean the arg up.
1255 */
1256 UNLOCK(&resarg->lock);
1257 isc_mutex_destroy(&resarg->lock);
1258 isc_mem_put(resarg->client->mctx, resarg, sizeof(*resarg));
1259 }
1260}
1261
1262isc_result_t
1263dns_client_resolve(dns_client_t *client, const dns_name_t *name,
1264 dns_rdataclass_t rdclass, dns_rdatatype_t type,
1265 unsigned int options, dns_namelist_t *namelist)
1266{
1267 isc_result_t result;
1268 isc_appctx_t *actx;
1269 resarg_t *resarg;
1270
1271 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
1272 REQUIRE(namelist != NULL && ISC_LIST_EMPTY(*namelist));
1273
1274 if ((client->attributes & DNS_CLIENTATTR_OWNCTX) == 0 &&
1275 (options & DNS_CLIENTRESOPT_ALLOWRUN) == 0) {
1276 /*
1277 * If the client is run under application's control, we need
1278 * to create a new running (sub)environment for this
1279 * particular resolution.
1280 */
1281 return (ISC_R_NOTIMPLEMENTED); /* XXXTBD */
1282 } else
1283 actx = client->actx;
1284
1285 resarg = isc_mem_get(client->mctx, sizeof(*resarg));
1286 if (resarg == NULL)
1287 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
1288
1289 isc_mutex_init(&resarg->lock);
1290
1291 resarg->actx = actx;
1292 resarg->client = client;
1293 resarg->result = DNS_R_SERVFAIL;
1294 resarg->namelist = namelist;
1295 resarg->trans = NULL;
1296 resarg->canceled = false;
1297 result = dns_client_startresolve(client, name, rdclass, type, options,
1298 client->task, resolve_done, resarg,
1299 &resarg->trans);
1300 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1301 isc_mutex_destroy(&resarg->lock);
1302 isc_mem_put(client->mctx, resarg, sizeof(*resarg));
1303 return (result);
1304 }
1305
1306 /*
1307 * Start internal event loop. It blocks until the entire process
1308 * is completed.
1309 */
1310 result = isc_app_ctxrun(actx);
1311
1312 LOCK(&resarg->lock);
1313 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS || result == ISC_R_SUSPEND)
1314 result = resarg->result;
1315 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS && resarg->vresult != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1316 /*
1317 * If this lookup failed due to some error in DNSSEC
1318 * validation, return the validation error code.
1319 * XXX: or should we pass the validation result separately?
1320 */
1321 result = resarg->vresult;
1322 }
1323 if (resarg->trans != NULL) {
1324 /*
1325 * Unusual termination (perhaps due to signal). We need some
1326 * tricky cleanup process.
1327 */
1328 resarg->canceled = true;
1329 dns_client_cancelresolve(resarg->trans);
1330
1331 UNLOCK(&resarg->lock);
1332
1333 /* resarg will be freed in the event handler. */
1334 } else {
1335 UNLOCK(&resarg->lock);
1336
1337 isc_mutex_destroy(&resarg->lock);
1338 isc_mem_put(client->mctx, resarg, sizeof(*resarg));
1339 }
1340
1341 return (result);
1342}
1343
1344isc_result_t
1345dns_client_startresolve(dns_client_t *client, const dns_name_t *name,
1346 dns_rdataclass_t rdclass, dns_rdatatype_t type,
1347 unsigned int options, isc_task_t *task,
1348 isc_taskaction_t action, void *arg,
1349 dns_clientrestrans_t **transp)
1350{
1351 dns_view_t *view = NULL;
1352 dns_clientresevent_t *event = NULL;
1353 resctx_t *rctx = NULL;
1354 isc_task_t *tclone = NULL;
1355 isc_mem_t *mctx;
1356 isc_result_t result;
1357 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset, *sigrdataset;
1358 bool want_dnssec, want_validation, want_cdflag, want_tcp;
1359
1360 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
1361 REQUIRE(transp != NULL && *transp == NULL);
1362
1363 LOCK(&client->lock);
1364 result = dns_viewlist_find(&client->viewlist, DNS_CLIENTVIEW_NAME,
1365 rdclass, &view);
1366 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
1367 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1368 return (result);
1369
1370 mctx = client->mctx;
1371 rdataset = NULL;
1372 sigrdataset = NULL;
1373 want_dnssec = ((options & DNS_CLIENTRESOPT_NODNSSEC) == 0);
1374 want_validation = ((options & DNS_CLIENTRESOPT_NOVALIDATE) == 0);
1375 want_cdflag = ((options & DNS_CLIENTRESOPT_NOCDFLAG) == 0);
1376 want_tcp = ((options & DNS_CLIENTRESOPT_TCP) != 0);
1377
1378 /*
1379 * Prepare some intermediate resources
1380 */
1381 tclone = NULL;
1382 isc_task_attach(task, &tclone);
1383 event = (dns_clientresevent_t *)
1384 isc_event_allocate(mctx, tclone, DNS_EVENT_CLIENTRESDONE,
1385 action, arg, sizeof(*event));
1386 if (event == NULL) {
1387 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
1388 goto cleanup;
1389 }
1390 event->result = DNS_R_SERVFAIL;
1391 ISC_LIST_INIT(event->answerlist);
1392
1393 rctx = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*rctx));
1394 if (rctx == NULL)
1395 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
1396 else {
1397 isc_mutex_init(&rctx->lock);
1398 }
1399 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1400 goto cleanup;
1401
1402 result = getrdataset(mctx, &rdataset);
1403 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1404 goto cleanup;
1405 rctx->rdataset = rdataset;
1406
1407 if (want_dnssec) {
1408 result = getrdataset(mctx, &sigrdataset);
1409 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1410 goto cleanup;
1411 }
1412 rctx->sigrdataset = sigrdataset;
1413
1414 dns_fixedname_init(&rctx->name);
1415 result = dns_name_copy(name, dns_fixedname_name(&rctx->name), NULL);
1416 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1417 goto cleanup;
1418
1419 rctx->client = client;
1420 ISC_LINK_INIT(rctx, link);
1421 rctx->canceled = false;
1422 rctx->task = client->task;
1423 rctx->type = type;
1424 rctx->view = view;
1425 rctx->restarts = 0;
1426 rctx->fetch = NULL;
1427 rctx->want_dnssec = want_dnssec;
1428 rctx->want_validation = want_validation;
1429 rctx->want_cdflag = want_cdflag;
1430 rctx->want_tcp = want_tcp;
1431 ISC_LIST_INIT(rctx->namelist);
1432 rctx->event = event;
1433
1434 rctx->magic = RCTX_MAGIC;
1435
1436 LOCK(&client->lock);
1437 ISC_LIST_APPEND(client->resctxs, rctx, link);
1438 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
1439
1440 *transp = (dns_clientrestrans_t *)rctx;
1441 client_resfind(rctx, NULL);
1442
1443 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1444
1445 cleanup:
1446 if (rdataset != NULL)
1447 putrdataset(client->mctx, &rdataset);
1448 if (sigrdataset != NULL)
1449 putrdataset(client->mctx, &sigrdataset);
1450 if (rctx != NULL) {
1451 isc_mutex_destroy(&rctx->lock);
1452 isc_mem_put(mctx, rctx, sizeof(*rctx));
1453 }
1454 if (event != NULL)
1455 isc_event_free(ISC_EVENT_PTR(&event));
1456 isc_task_detach(&tclone);
1457 dns_view_detach(&view);
1458
1459 return (result);
1460}
1461
1462void
1463dns_client_cancelresolve(dns_clientrestrans_t *trans) {
1464 resctx_t *rctx;
1465
1466 REQUIRE(trans != NULL);
1467 rctx = (resctx_t *)trans;
1468 REQUIRE(RCTX_VALID(rctx));
1469
1470 LOCK(&rctx->lock);
1471
1472 if (!rctx->canceled) {
1473 rctx->canceled = true;
1474 if (rctx->fetch != NULL)
1475 dns_resolver_cancelfetch(rctx->fetch);
1476 }
1477
1478 UNLOCK(&rctx->lock);
1479}
1480
1481void
1482dns_client_freeresanswer(dns_client_t *client, dns_namelist_t *namelist) {
1483 dns_name_t *name;
1484 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
1485
1486 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
1487 REQUIRE(namelist != NULL);
1488
1489 while ((name = ISC_LIST_HEAD(*namelist)) != NULL) {
1490 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(*namelist, name, link);
1491 while ((rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list)) != NULL) {
1492 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(name->list, rdataset, link);
1493 putrdataset(client->mctx, &rdataset);
1494 }
1495 dns_name_free(name, client->mctx);
1496 isc_mem_put(client->mctx, name, sizeof(*name));
1497 }
1498}
1499
1500void
1501dns_client_destroyrestrans(dns_clientrestrans_t **transp) {
1502 resctx_t *rctx;
1503 isc_mem_t *mctx;
1504 dns_client_t *client;
1505 bool need_destroyclient = false;
1506
1507 REQUIRE(transp != NULL);
1508 rctx = (resctx_t *)*transp;
1509 REQUIRE(RCTX_VALID(rctx));
1510 REQUIRE(rctx->fetch == NULL);
1511 REQUIRE(rctx->event == NULL);
1512 client = rctx->client;
1513 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
1514
1515 mctx = client->mctx;
1516 dns_view_detach(&rctx->view);
1517
1518 /*
1519 * Wait for the lock in client_resfind to be released before
1520 * destroying the lock.
1521 */
1522 LOCK(&rctx->lock);
1523 UNLOCK(&rctx->lock);
1524
1525 LOCK(&client->lock);
1526
1527 INSIST(ISC_LINK_LINKED(rctx, link));
1528 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(client->resctxs, rctx, link);
1529
1530 if (client->references == 0 && ISC_LIST_EMPTY(client->resctxs) &&
1531 ISC_LIST_EMPTY(client->reqctxs) &&
1532 ISC_LIST_EMPTY(client->updatectxs))
1533 need_destroyclient = true;
1534
1535 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
1536
1537 INSIST(ISC_LIST_EMPTY(rctx->namelist));
1538
1539 isc_mutex_destroy(&rctx->lock);
1540 rctx->magic = 0;
1541
1542 isc_mem_put(mctx, rctx, sizeof(*rctx));
1543
1544 if (need_destroyclient)
1545 destroyclient(&client);
1546
1547 *transp = NULL;
1548}
1549
1550isc_result_t
1551dns_client_addtrustedkey(dns_client_t *client, dns_rdataclass_t rdclass,
1552 const dns_name_t *keyname, isc_buffer_t *keydatabuf)
1553{
1554 isc_result_t result;
1555 dns_view_t *view = NULL;
1556 dst_key_t *dstkey = NULL;
1557 dns_keytable_t *secroots = NULL;
1558
1559 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
1560
1561 LOCK(&client->lock);
1562 result = dns_viewlist_find(&client->viewlist, DNS_CLIENTVIEW_NAME,
1563 rdclass, &view);
1564 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
1565 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1566 goto cleanup;
1567
1568 result = dns_view_getsecroots(view, &secroots);
1569 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1570 goto cleanup;
1571
1572 result = dst_key_fromdns(keyname, rdclass, keydatabuf, client->mctx,
1573 &dstkey);
1574 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1575 goto cleanup;
1576
1577 result = dns_keytable_add(secroots, false, false, &dstkey);
1578
1579 cleanup:
1580 if (dstkey != NULL)
1581 dst_key_free(&dstkey);
1582 if (view != NULL)
1583 dns_view_detach(&view);
1584 if (secroots != NULL)
1585 dns_keytable_detach(&secroots);
1586 return (result);
1587}
1588
1589/*%
1590 * Simple request routines
1591 */
1592static void
1593request_done(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
1594 dns_requestevent_t *reqev = NULL;
1595 dns_request_t *request;
1596 isc_result_t result, eresult;
1597 reqctx_t *ctx;
1598
1599 UNUSED(task);
1600
1601 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_REQUESTDONE);
1602 reqev = (dns_requestevent_t *)event;
1603 request = reqev->request;
1604 result = eresult = reqev->result;
1605 ctx = reqev->ev_arg;
1606 REQUIRE(REQCTX_VALID(ctx));
1607
1608 isc_event_free(&event);
1609
1610 LOCK(&ctx->lock);
1611
1612 if (eresult == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1613 result = dns_request_getresponse(request, ctx->event->rmessage,
1614 ctx->parseoptions);
1615 }
1616
1617 if (ctx->tsigkey != NULL)
1618 dns_tsigkey_detach(&ctx->tsigkey);
1619
1620 if (ctx->canceled)
1621 ctx->event->result = ISC_R_CANCELED;
1622 else
1623 ctx->event->result = result;
1624 task = ctx->event->ev_sender;
1625 ctx->event->ev_sender = ctx;
1626 isc_task_sendanddetach(&task, ISC_EVENT_PTR(&ctx->event));
1627
1628 UNLOCK(&ctx->lock);
1629}
1630
1631static void
1632localrequest_done(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
1633 reqarg_t *reqarg = event->ev_arg;
1634 dns_clientreqevent_t *rev =(dns_clientreqevent_t *)event;
1635
1636 UNUSED(task);
1637
1638 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_CLIENTREQDONE);
1639
1640 LOCK(&reqarg->lock);
1641
1642 reqarg->result = rev->result;
1643 dns_client_destroyreqtrans(&reqarg->trans);
1644 isc_event_free(&event);
1645
1646 if (!reqarg->canceled) {
1647 UNLOCK(&reqarg->lock);
1648
1649 /* Exit from the internal event loop */
1650 isc_app_ctxsuspend(reqarg->actx);
1651 } else {
1652 /*
1653 * We have already exited from the loop (due to some
1654 * unexpected event). Just clean the arg up.
1655 */
1656 UNLOCK(&reqarg->lock);
1657 isc_mutex_destroy(&reqarg->lock);
1658 isc_mem_put(reqarg->client->mctx, reqarg, sizeof(*reqarg));
1659 }
1660}
1661
1662isc_result_t
1663dns_client_request(dns_client_t *client, dns_message_t *qmessage,
1664 dns_message_t *rmessage, const isc_sockaddr_t *server,
1665 unsigned int options, unsigned int parseoptions,
1666 dns_tsec_t *tsec, unsigned int timeout,
1667 unsigned int udptimeout, unsigned int udpretries)
1668{
1669 isc_appctx_t *actx;
1670 reqarg_t *reqarg;
1671 isc_result_t result;
1672
1673 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
1674 REQUIRE(qmessage != NULL);
1675 REQUIRE(rmessage != NULL);
1676
1677 if ((client->attributes & DNS_CLIENTATTR_OWNCTX) == 0 &&
1678 (options & DNS_CLIENTREQOPT_ALLOWRUN) == 0) {
1679 /*
1680 * If the client is run under application's control, we need
1681 * to create a new running (sub)environment for this
1682 * particular resolution.
1683 */
1684 return (ISC_R_NOTIMPLEMENTED); /* XXXTBD */
1685 } else
1686 actx = client->actx;
1687
1688 reqarg = isc_mem_get(client->mctx, sizeof(*reqarg));
1689 if (reqarg == NULL)
1690 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
1691
1692 isc_mutex_init(&reqarg->lock);
1693
1694 reqarg->actx = actx;
1695 reqarg->client = client;
1696 reqarg->trans = NULL;
1697 reqarg->canceled = false;
1698
1699 result = dns_client_startrequest(client, qmessage, rmessage, server,
1700 options, parseoptions, tsec, timeout,
1701 udptimeout, udpretries,
1702 client->task, localrequest_done,
1703 reqarg, &reqarg->trans);
1704 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1705 isc_mutex_destroy(&reqarg->lock);
1706 isc_mem_put(client->mctx, reqarg, sizeof(*reqarg));
1707 return (result);
1708 }
1709
1710 /*
1711 * Start internal event loop. It blocks until the entire process
1712 * is completed.
1713 */
1714 result = isc_app_ctxrun(actx);
1715
1716 LOCK(&reqarg->lock);
1717 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS || result == ISC_R_SUSPEND)
1718 result = reqarg->result;
1719 if (reqarg->trans != NULL) {
1720 /*
1721 * Unusual termination (perhaps due to signal). We need some
1722 * tricky cleanup process.
1723 */
1724 reqarg->canceled = true;
1725 dns_client_cancelresolve(reqarg->trans);
1726
1727 UNLOCK(&reqarg->lock);
1728
1729 /* reqarg will be freed in the event handler. */
1730 } else {
1731 UNLOCK(&reqarg->lock);
1732
1733 isc_mutex_destroy(&reqarg->lock);
1734 isc_mem_put(client->mctx, reqarg, sizeof(*reqarg));
1735 }
1736
1737 return (result);
1738}
1739
1740isc_result_t
1741dns_client_startrequest(dns_client_t *client, dns_message_t *qmessage,
1742 dns_message_t *rmessage, const isc_sockaddr_t *server,
1743 unsigned int options, unsigned int parseoptions,
1744 dns_tsec_t *tsec, unsigned int timeout,
1745 unsigned int udptimeout, unsigned int udpretries,
1746 isc_task_t *task, isc_taskaction_t action, void *arg,
1747 dns_clientreqtrans_t **transp)
1748{
1749 isc_result_t result;
1750 dns_view_t *view = NULL;
1751 isc_task_t *tclone = NULL;
1752 dns_clientreqevent_t *event = NULL;
1753 reqctx_t *ctx = NULL;
1754 dns_tsectype_t tsectype = dns_tsectype_none;
1755 unsigned int reqoptions;
1756
1757 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
1758 REQUIRE(qmessage != NULL);
1759 REQUIRE(rmessage != NULL);
1760 REQUIRE(transp != NULL && *transp == NULL);
1761
1762 if (tsec != NULL) {
1763 tsectype = dns_tsec_gettype(tsec);
1764 if (tsectype != dns_tsectype_tsig)
1765 return (ISC_R_NOTIMPLEMENTED); /* XXX */
1766 }
1767
1768 LOCK(&client->lock);
1769 result = dns_viewlist_find(&client->viewlist, DNS_CLIENTVIEW_NAME,
1770 qmessage->rdclass, &view);
1771 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
1772 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1773 return (result);
1774
1775 reqoptions = 0;
1776 if ((options & DNS_CLIENTREQOPT_TCP) != 0)
1777 reqoptions |= DNS_REQUESTOPT_TCP;
1778
1779 tclone = NULL;
1780 isc_task_attach(task, &tclone);
1781 event = (dns_clientreqevent_t *)
1782 isc_event_allocate(client->mctx, tclone,
1783 DNS_EVENT_CLIENTREQDONE,
1784 action, arg, sizeof(*event));
1785 if (event == NULL) {
1786 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
1787 goto cleanup;
1788 }
1789
1790 ctx = isc_mem_get(client->mctx, sizeof(*ctx));
1791 if (ctx == NULL)
1792 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
1793 else {
1794 isc_mutex_init(&ctx->lock);
1795 }
1796 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1797 goto cleanup;
1798
1799 ctx->client = client;
1800 ISC_LINK_INIT(ctx, link);
1801 ctx->parseoptions = parseoptions;
1802 ctx->canceled = false;
1803 ctx->event = event;
1804 ctx->event->rmessage = rmessage;
1805 ctx->tsigkey = NULL;
1806 if (tsec != NULL)
1807 dns_tsec_getkey(tsec, &ctx->tsigkey);
1808
1809 ctx->magic = REQCTX_MAGIC;
1810
1811 LOCK(&client->lock);
1812 ISC_LIST_APPEND(client->reqctxs, ctx, link);
1813 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
1814
1815 ctx->request = NULL;
1816 result = dns_request_createvia(view->requestmgr, qmessage, NULL,
1817 server, -1, reqoptions, ctx->tsigkey,
1818 timeout, udptimeout, udpretries,
1819 client->task, request_done, ctx,
1820 &ctx->request);
1821 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1822 dns_view_detach(&view);
1823 *transp = (dns_clientreqtrans_t *)ctx;
1824 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1825 }
1826
1827 cleanup:
1828 if (ctx != NULL) {
1829 LOCK(&client->lock);
1830 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(client->reqctxs, ctx, link);
1831 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
1832 isc_mutex_destroy(&ctx->lock);
1833 isc_mem_put(client->mctx, ctx, sizeof(*ctx));
1834 }
1835 if (event != NULL)
1836 isc_event_free(ISC_EVENT_PTR(&event));
1837 isc_task_detach(&tclone);
1838 dns_view_detach(&view);
1839
1840 return (result);
1841}
1842
1843void
1844dns_client_cancelrequest(dns_clientreqtrans_t *trans) {
1845 reqctx_t *ctx;
1846
1847 REQUIRE(trans != NULL);
1848 ctx = (reqctx_t *)trans;
1849 REQUIRE(REQCTX_VALID(ctx));
1850
1851 LOCK(&ctx->lock);
1852
1853 if (!ctx->canceled) {
1854 ctx->canceled = true;
1855 if (ctx->request != NULL)
1856 dns_request_cancel(ctx->request);
1857 }
1858
1859 UNLOCK(&ctx->lock);
1860}
1861
1862void
1863dns_client_destroyreqtrans(dns_clientreqtrans_t **transp) {
1864 reqctx_t *ctx;
1865 isc_mem_t *mctx;
1866 dns_client_t *client;
1867 bool need_destroyclient = false;
1868
1869 REQUIRE(transp != NULL);
1870 ctx = (reqctx_t *)*transp;
1871 REQUIRE(REQCTX_VALID(ctx));
1872 client = ctx->client;
1873 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
1874 REQUIRE(ctx->event == NULL);
1875 REQUIRE(ctx->request != NULL);
1876
1877 dns_request_destroy(&ctx->request);
1878 mctx = client->mctx;
1879
1880 LOCK(&client->lock);
1881
1882 INSIST(ISC_LINK_LINKED(ctx, link));
1883 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(client->reqctxs, ctx, link);
1884
1885 if (client->references == 0 && ISC_LIST_EMPTY(client->resctxs) &&
1886 ISC_LIST_EMPTY(client->reqctxs) &&
1887 ISC_LIST_EMPTY(client->updatectxs)) {
1888 need_destroyclient = true;
1889 }
1890
1891 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
1892
1893 isc_mutex_destroy(&ctx->lock);
1894 ctx->magic = 0;
1895
1896 isc_mem_put(mctx, ctx, sizeof(*ctx));
1897
1898 if (need_destroyclient)
1899 destroyclient(&client);
1900
1901 *transp = NULL;
1902}
1903
1904/*%
1905 * Dynamic update routines
1906 */
1907static isc_result_t
1908rcode2result(dns_rcode_t rcode) {
1909 /* XXX: isn't there a similar function? */
1910 switch (rcode) {
1911 case dns_rcode_formerr:
1912 return (DNS_R_FORMERR);
1913 case dns_rcode_servfail:
1914 return (DNS_R_SERVFAIL);
1915 case dns_rcode_nxdomain:
1916 return (DNS_R_NXDOMAIN);
1917 case dns_rcode_notimp:
1918 return (DNS_R_NOTIMP);
1919 case dns_rcode_refused:
1920 return (DNS_R_REFUSED);
1921 case dns_rcode_yxdomain:
1922 return (DNS_R_YXDOMAIN);
1923 case dns_rcode_yxrrset:
1924 return (DNS_R_YXRRSET);
1925 case dns_rcode_nxrrset:
1926 return (DNS_R_NXRRSET);
1927 case dns_rcode_notauth:
1928 return (DNS_R_NOTAUTH);
1929 case dns_rcode_notzone:
1930 return (DNS_R_NOTZONE);
1931 case dns_rcode_badvers:
1932 return (DNS_R_BADVERS);
1933 }
1934
1935 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
1936}
1937
1938static void
1939update_sendevent(updatectx_t *uctx, isc_result_t result) {
1940 isc_task_t *task;
1941
1942 dns_message_destroy(&uctx->updatemsg);
1943 if (uctx->tsigkey != NULL)
1944 dns_tsigkey_detach(&uctx->tsigkey);
1945 if (uctx->sig0key != NULL)
1946 dst_key_free(&uctx->sig0key);
1947
1948 if (uctx->canceled)
1949 uctx->event->result = ISC_R_CANCELED;
1950 else
1951 uctx->event->result = result;
1952 uctx->event->state = uctx->state;
1953 task = uctx->event->ev_sender;
1954 uctx->event->ev_sender = uctx;
1955 isc_task_sendanddetach(&task, ISC_EVENT_PTR(&uctx->event));
1956}
1957
1958static void
1959update_done(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
1960 isc_result_t result;
1961 dns_requestevent_t *reqev = NULL;
1962 dns_request_t *request;
1963 dns_message_t *answer = NULL;
1964 updatectx_t *uctx = event->ev_arg;
1965 dns_client_t *client;
1966 unsigned int timeout, reqoptions;
1967
1968 UNUSED(task);
1969
1970 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_REQUESTDONE);
1971 reqev = (dns_requestevent_t *)event;
1972 request = reqev->request;
1973 REQUIRE(UCTX_VALID(uctx));
1974 client = uctx->client;
1975 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
1976
1977 result = reqev->result;
1978 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1979 goto out;
1980
1981 result = dns_message_create(client->mctx, DNS_MESSAGE_INTENTPARSE,
1982 &answer);
1983 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1984 goto out;
1985 uctx->state = dns_clientupdatestate_done;
1986 result = dns_request_getresponse(request, answer,
1987 DNS_MESSAGEPARSE_PRESERVEORDER);
1988 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && answer->rcode != dns_rcode_noerror)
1989 result = rcode2result(answer->rcode);
1990
1991 out:
1992 if (answer != NULL)
1993 dns_message_destroy(&answer);
1994 isc_event_free(&event);
1995
1996 LOCK(&uctx->lock);
1997 uctx->currentserver = ISC_LIST_NEXT(uctx->currentserver, link);
1998 dns_request_destroy(&uctx->updatereq);
1999 /*
2000 * Moving on to the next server shouldn't change the result
2001 * for NXDOMAIN, YXDOMAIN, NXRRSET and YXRRSET as they
2002 * indicate a prerequisite failure. REFUSED should also
2003 * be consistent across all servers but often isn't as that
2004 * is policy rather that zone content driven (slaves that
2005 * aren't willing to forward should return NOTIMPL). NOTZONE
2006 * indicates that we stuffed up the request construction so
2007 * don't retry.
2008 */
2009 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS && result != DNS_R_NXDOMAIN &&
2010 result != DNS_R_YXDOMAIN && result != DNS_R_YXRRSET &&
2011 result != DNS_R_NXRRSET && result != DNS_R_NOTZONE &&
2012 !uctx->canceled && uctx->currentserver != NULL)
2013 {
2014 dns_message_renderreset(uctx->updatemsg);
2015 dns_message_settsigkey(uctx->updatemsg, NULL);
2016
2017 timeout = client->update_timeout / uctx->nservers;
2018 if (timeout < MIN_UPDATE_TIMEOUT)
2019 timeout = MIN_UPDATE_TIMEOUT;
2020 reqoptions = 0;
2021 if (uctx->want_tcp)
2022 reqoptions |= DNS_REQUESTOPT_TCP;
2023 result = dns_request_createvia(uctx->view->requestmgr,
2024 uctx->updatemsg,
2025 NULL,
2026 uctx->currentserver,
2027 -1,
2028 reqoptions,
2029 uctx->tsigkey,
2030 timeout,
2031 client->update_udptimeout,
2032 client->update_udpretries,
2033 client->task,
2034 update_done, uctx,
2035 &uctx->updatereq);
2036 UNLOCK(&uctx->lock);
2037
2038 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2039 /* XXX: should we keep the 'done' state here? */
2040 uctx->state = dns_clientupdatestate_sent;
2041 return;
2042 }
2043 } else
2044 UNLOCK(&uctx->lock);
2045
2046 update_sendevent(uctx, result);
2047}
2048
2049static isc_result_t
2050send_update(updatectx_t *uctx) {
2051 isc_result_t result;
2052 dns_name_t *name = NULL;
2053 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset = NULL;
2054 dns_client_t *client = uctx->client;
2055 unsigned int timeout, reqoptions;
2056
2057 REQUIRE(uctx->zonename != NULL && uctx->currentserver != NULL);
2058
2059 result = dns_message_gettempname(uctx->updatemsg, &name);
2060 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2061 return (result);
2062 dns_name_init(name, NULL);
2063 dns_name_clone(uctx->zonename, name);
2064 result = dns_message_gettemprdataset(uctx->updatemsg, &rdataset);
2065 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2066 dns_message_puttempname(uctx->updatemsg, &name);
2067 return (result);
2068 }
2069 dns_rdataset_makequestion(rdataset, uctx->rdclass, dns_rdatatype_soa);
2070 ISC_LIST_INIT(name->list);
2071 ISC_LIST_APPEND(name->list, rdataset, link);
2072 dns_message_addname(uctx->updatemsg, name, DNS_SECTION_ZONE);
2073 if (uctx->tsigkey == NULL && uctx->sig0key != NULL) {
2074 result = dns_message_setsig0key(uctx->updatemsg,
2075 uctx->sig0key);
2076 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2077 return (result);
2078 }
2079 timeout = client->update_timeout / uctx->nservers;
2080 if (timeout < MIN_UPDATE_TIMEOUT)
2081 timeout = MIN_UPDATE_TIMEOUT;
2082 reqoptions = 0;
2083 if (uctx->want_tcp)
2084 reqoptions |= DNS_REQUESTOPT_TCP;
2085 result = dns_request_createvia(uctx->view->requestmgr,
2086 uctx->updatemsg,
2087 NULL, uctx->currentserver,
2088 -1, reqoptions, uctx->tsigkey, timeout,
2089 client->update_udptimeout,
2090 client->update_udpretries,
2091 client->task, update_done, uctx,
2092 &uctx->updatereq);
2093 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS &&
2094 uctx->state == dns_clientupdatestate_prepare) {
2095 uctx->state = dns_clientupdatestate_sent;
2096 }
2097
2098 return (result);
2099}
2100
2101static void
2102resolveaddr_done(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
2103 isc_result_t result;
2104 int family;
2105 dns_rdatatype_t qtype;
2106 dns_clientresevent_t *rev = (dns_clientresevent_t *)event;
2107 dns_name_t *name;
2108 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
2109 updatectx_t *uctx;
2110 bool completed = false;
2111
2112 UNUSED(task);
2113
2114 REQUIRE(event->ev_arg != NULL);
2115 uctx = *(updatectx_t **)event->ev_arg;
2116 REQUIRE(UCTX_VALID(uctx));
2117
2118 if (event->ev_arg == &uctx->bp4) {
2119 family = AF_INET;
2120 qtype = dns_rdatatype_a;
2121 LOCK(&uctx->lock);
2122 dns_client_destroyrestrans(&uctx->restrans);
2123 UNLOCK(&uctx->lock);
2124 } else {
2125 INSIST(event->ev_arg == &uctx->bp6);
2126 family = AF_INET6;
2127 qtype = dns_rdatatype_aaaa;
2128 LOCK(&uctx->lock);
2129 dns_client_destroyrestrans(&uctx->restrans2);
2130 UNLOCK(&uctx->lock);
2131 }
2132
2133 result = rev->result;
2134 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2135 goto done;
2136
2137 for (name = ISC_LIST_HEAD(rev->answerlist); name != NULL;
2138 name = ISC_LIST_NEXT(name, link)) {
2139 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
2140 rdataset != NULL;
2141 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link)) {
2142 if (!dns_rdataset_isassociated(rdataset))
2143 continue;
2144 if (rdataset->type != qtype)
2145 continue;
2146
2147 for (result = dns_rdataset_first(rdataset);
2148 result == ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2149 result = dns_rdataset_next(rdataset)) {
2150 dns_rdata_t rdata;
2151 dns_rdata_in_a_t rdata_a;
2152 dns_rdata_in_aaaa_t rdata_aaaa;
2153 isc_sockaddr_t *sa;
2154
2155 sa = isc_mem_get(uctx->client->mctx,
2156 sizeof(*sa));
2157 if (sa == NULL) {
2158 /*
2159 * If we fail to get a sockaddr,
2160 we simply move forward with the
2161 * addresses we've got so far.
2162 */
2163 goto done;
2164 }
2165
2166 dns_rdata_init(&rdata);
2167 switch (family) {
2168 case AF_INET:
2169 dns_rdataset_current(rdataset, &rdata);
2170 result = dns_rdata_tostruct(&rdata, &rdata_a,
2171 NULL);
2172 RUNTIME_CHECK(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
2173 isc_sockaddr_fromin(sa,
2174 &rdata_a.in_addr,
2175 53);
2176 dns_rdata_freestruct(&rdata_a);
2177 break;
2178 case AF_INET6:
2179 dns_rdataset_current(rdataset, &rdata);
2180 result = dns_rdata_tostruct(&rdata, &rdata_aaaa,
2181 NULL);
2182 RUNTIME_CHECK(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
2183 isc_sockaddr_fromin6(sa,
2184 &rdata_aaaa.in6_addr,
2185 53);
2186 dns_rdata_freestruct(&rdata_aaaa);
2187 break;
2188 }
2189
2190 ISC_LINK_INIT(sa, link);
2191 ISC_LIST_APPEND(uctx->servers, sa, link);
2192 uctx->nservers++;
2193 }
2194 }
2195 }
2196
2197 done:
2198 dns_client_freeresanswer(uctx->client, &rev->answerlist);
2199 isc_event_free(&event);
2200
2201 LOCK(&uctx->lock);
2202 if (uctx->restrans == NULL && uctx->restrans2 == NULL)
2203 completed = true;
2204 UNLOCK(&uctx->lock);
2205
2206 if (completed) {
2207 INSIST(uctx->currentserver == NULL);
2208 uctx->currentserver = ISC_LIST_HEAD(uctx->servers);
2209 if (uctx->currentserver != NULL && !uctx->canceled)
2210 send_update(uctx);
2211 else {
2212 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2213 result = ISC_R_NOTFOUND;
2214 update_sendevent(uctx, result);
2215 }
2216 }
2217}
2218
2219static isc_result_t
2220process_soa(updatectx_t *uctx, dns_rdataset_t *soaset,
2221 const dns_name_t *soaname)
2222{
2223 isc_result_t result;
2224 dns_rdata_t soarr = DNS_RDATA_INIT;
2225 dns_rdata_soa_t soa;
2226 dns_name_t primary;
2227 unsigned int resoptions;
2228
2229 result = dns_rdataset_first(soaset);
2230 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2231 return (result);
2232 dns_rdata_init(&soarr);
2233 dns_rdataset_current(soaset, &soarr);
2234 result = dns_rdata_tostruct(&soarr, &soa, NULL);
2235 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2236 return (result);
2237
2238 dns_name_init(&primary, NULL);
2239 dns_name_clone(&soa.origin, &primary);
2240
2241 if (uctx->zonename == NULL) {
2242 uctx->zonename = dns_fixedname_name(&uctx->zonefname);
2243 result = dns_name_copy(soaname, uctx->zonename, NULL);
2244 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2245 goto out;
2246 }
2247
2248 if (uctx->currentserver != NULL)
2249 result = send_update(uctx);
2250 else {
2251 /*
2252 * Get addresses of the primary server. We don't use the ADB
2253 * feature so that we could avoid caching data.
2254 */
2255 LOCK(&uctx->lock);
2256 uctx->bp4 = uctx;
2257 resoptions = 0;
2258 if (uctx->want_tcp)
2259 resoptions |= DNS_CLIENTRESOPT_TCP;
2260 result = dns_client_startresolve(uctx->client, &primary,
2261 uctx->rdclass,
2262 dns_rdatatype_a,
2263 resoptions,
2264 uctx->client->task,
2265 resolveaddr_done, &uctx->bp4,
2266 &uctx->restrans);
2267 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2268 uctx->bp6 = uctx;
2269 result = dns_client_startresolve(uctx->client,
2270 &primary,
2271 uctx->rdclass,
2272 dns_rdatatype_aaaa,
2273 resoptions,
2274 uctx->client->task,
2275 resolveaddr_done,
2276 &uctx->bp6,
2277 &uctx->restrans2);
2278 }
2279 UNLOCK(&uctx->lock);
2280 }
2281
2282 out:
2283 dns_rdata_freestruct(&soa);
2284
2285 return (result);
2286}
2287
2288static void
2289receive_soa(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
2290 dns_requestevent_t *reqev = NULL;
2291 updatectx_t *uctx;
2292 dns_client_t *client;
2293 isc_result_t result, eresult;
2294 dns_request_t *request;
2295 dns_message_t *rcvmsg = NULL;
2296 dns_section_t section;
2297 dns_rdataset_t *soaset = NULL;
2298 int pass = 0;
2299 dns_name_t *name;
2300 dns_message_t *soaquery = NULL;
2301 isc_sockaddr_t *addr;
2302 bool seencname = false;
2303 bool droplabel = false;
2304 dns_name_t tname;
2305 unsigned int nlabels, reqoptions;
2306
2307 UNUSED(task);
2308
2309 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_REQUESTDONE);
2310 reqev = (dns_requestevent_t *)event;
2311 request = reqev->request;
2312 result = eresult = reqev->result;
2313 POST(result);
2314 uctx = reqev->ev_arg;
2315 client = uctx->client;
2316 soaquery = uctx->soaquery;
2317 addr = uctx->currentserver;
2318 INSIST(addr != NULL);
2319
2320 isc_event_free(&event);
2321
2322 if (eresult != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2323 result = eresult;
2324 goto out;
2325 }
2326
2327 result = dns_message_create(uctx->client->mctx,
2328 DNS_MESSAGE_INTENTPARSE, &rcvmsg);
2329 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2330 goto out;
2331 result = dns_request_getresponse(request, rcvmsg,
2332 DNS_MESSAGEPARSE_PRESERVEORDER);
2333
2334 if (result == DNS_R_TSIGERRORSET) {
2335 dns_request_t *newrequest = NULL;
2336
2337 /* Retry SOA request without TSIG */
2338 dns_message_destroy(&rcvmsg);
2339 dns_message_renderreset(uctx->soaquery);
2340 reqoptions = 0;
2341 if (uctx->want_tcp)
2342 reqoptions |= DNS_REQUESTOPT_TCP;
2343 result = dns_request_createvia(uctx->view->requestmgr,
2344 uctx->soaquery, NULL, addr, -1,
2345 reqoptions, NULL,
2346 client->find_timeout * 20,
2347 client->find_timeout, 3,
2348 uctx->client->task,
2349 receive_soa, uctx,
2350 &newrequest);
2351 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2352 LOCK(&uctx->lock);
2353 dns_request_destroy(&uctx->soareq);
2354 uctx->soareq = newrequest;
2355 UNLOCK(&uctx->lock);
2356
2357 return;
2358 }
2359 goto out;
2360 }
2361
2362 section = DNS_SECTION_ANSWER;
2363 POST(section);
2364
2365 if (rcvmsg->rcode != dns_rcode_noerror &&
2366 rcvmsg->rcode != dns_rcode_nxdomain) {
2367 result = rcode2result(rcvmsg->rcode);
2368 goto out;
2369 }
2370
2371 lookforsoa:
2372 if (pass == 0)
2373 section = DNS_SECTION_ANSWER;
2374 else if (pass == 1)
2375 section = DNS_SECTION_AUTHORITY;
2376 else {
2377 droplabel = true;
2378 goto out;
2379 }
2380
2381 result = dns_message_firstname(rcvmsg, section);
2382 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2383 pass++;
2384 goto lookforsoa;
2385 }
2386 while (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2387 name = NULL;
2388 dns_message_currentname(rcvmsg, section, &name);
2389 soaset = NULL;
2390 result = dns_message_findtype(name, dns_rdatatype_soa, 0,
2391 &soaset);
2392 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2393 break;
2394 if (section == DNS_SECTION_ANSWER) {
2395 dns_rdataset_t *tset = NULL;
2396 if (dns_message_findtype(name, dns_rdatatype_cname, 0,
2397 &tset) == ISC_R_SUCCESS
2398 ||
2399 dns_message_findtype(name, dns_rdatatype_dname, 0,
2400 &tset) == ISC_R_SUCCESS
2401 )
2402 {
2403 seencname = true;
2404 break;
2405 }
2406 }
2407
2408 result = dns_message_nextname(rcvmsg, section);
2409 }
2410
2411 if (soaset == NULL && !seencname) {
2412 pass++;
2413 goto lookforsoa;
2414 }
2415
2416 if (seencname) {
2417 droplabel = true;
2418 goto out;
2419 }
2420
2421 result = process_soa(uctx, soaset, name);
2422
2423 out:
2424 if (droplabel) {
2425 result = dns_message_firstname(soaquery, DNS_SECTION_QUESTION);
2426 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
2427 name = NULL;
2428 dns_message_currentname(soaquery, DNS_SECTION_QUESTION, &name);
2429 nlabels = dns_name_countlabels(name);
2430 if (nlabels == 1)
2431 result = DNS_R_SERVFAIL; /* is there a better error? */
2432 else {
2433 dns_name_init(&tname, NULL);
2434 dns_name_getlabelsequence(name, 1, nlabels - 1,
2435 &tname);
2436 dns_name_clone(&tname, name);
2437 dns_request_destroy(&request);
2438 LOCK(&uctx->lock);
2439 uctx->soareq = NULL;
2440 UNLOCK(&uctx->lock);
2441 dns_message_renderreset(soaquery);
2442 dns_message_settsigkey(soaquery, NULL);
2443 reqoptions = 0;
2444 if (uctx->want_tcp)
2445 reqoptions |= DNS_REQUESTOPT_TCP;
2446 result = dns_request_createvia(uctx->view->requestmgr,
2447 soaquery, NULL,
2448 uctx->currentserver,
2449 -1,
2450 reqoptions,
2451 uctx->tsigkey,
2452 client->find_timeout *
2453 20,
2454 client->find_timeout,
2455 3, client->task,
2456 receive_soa, uctx,
2457 &uctx->soareq);
2458 }
2459 }
2460
2461 if (!droplabel || result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2462 dns_message_destroy(&uctx->soaquery);
2463 LOCK(&uctx->lock);
2464 dns_request_destroy(&uctx->soareq);
2465 UNLOCK(&uctx->lock);
2466 }
2467
2468 if (rcvmsg != NULL)
2469 dns_message_destroy(&rcvmsg);
2470
2471 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2472 update_sendevent(uctx, result);
2473}
2474
2475static isc_result_t
2476request_soa(updatectx_t *uctx) {
2477 isc_result_t result;
2478 dns_message_t *soaquery = uctx->soaquery;
2479 dns_name_t *name = NULL;
2480 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset = NULL;
2481 unsigned int reqoptions;
2482
2483 if (soaquery == NULL) {
2484 result = dns_message_create(uctx->client->mctx,
2485 DNS_MESSAGE_INTENTRENDER,
2486 &soaquery);
2487 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2488 return (result);
2489 }
2490 soaquery->flags |= DNS_MESSAGEFLAG_RD;
2491 result = dns_message_gettempname(soaquery, &name);
2492 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2493 goto fail;
2494 result = dns_message_gettemprdataset(soaquery, &rdataset);
2495 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2496 goto fail;
2497 dns_rdataset_makequestion(rdataset, uctx->rdclass, dns_rdatatype_soa);
2498 dns_name_clone(uctx->firstname, name);
2499 ISC_LIST_APPEND(name->list, rdataset, link);
2500 dns_message_addname(soaquery, name, DNS_SECTION_QUESTION);
2501 rdataset = NULL;
2502 name = NULL;
2503 reqoptions = 0;
2504 if (uctx->want_tcp)
2505 reqoptions |= DNS_REQUESTOPT_TCP;
2506
2507 result = dns_request_createvia(uctx->view->requestmgr,
2508 soaquery, NULL, uctx->currentserver,
2509 -1, reqoptions, uctx->tsigkey,
2510 uctx->client->find_timeout * 20,
2511 uctx->client->find_timeout, 3,
2512 uctx->client->task, receive_soa, uctx,
2513 &uctx->soareq);
2514 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2515 uctx->soaquery = soaquery;
2516 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
2517 }
2518
2519 fail:
2520 if (rdataset != NULL) {
2521 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(name->list, rdataset, link); /* for safety */
2522 dns_message_puttemprdataset(soaquery, &rdataset);
2523 }
2524 if (name != NULL)
2525 dns_message_puttempname(soaquery, &name);
2526 dns_message_destroy(&soaquery);
2527
2528 return (result);
2529}
2530
2531static void
2532resolvesoa_done(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
2533 dns_clientresevent_t *rev = (dns_clientresevent_t *)event;
2534 updatectx_t *uctx;
2535 dns_name_t *name, tname;
2536 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset = NULL;
2537 isc_result_t result = rev->result;
2538 unsigned int nlabels, resoptions;
2539
2540 UNUSED(task);
2541
2542 uctx = event->ev_arg;
2543 REQUIRE(UCTX_VALID(uctx));
2544
2545 LOCK(&uctx->lock);
2546 dns_client_destroyrestrans(&uctx->restrans);
2547 UNLOCK(&uctx->lock);
2548
2549 uctx = event->ev_arg;
2550 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS &&
2551 result != DNS_R_NCACHENXDOMAIN &&
2552 result != DNS_R_NCACHENXRRSET) {
2553 /* XXX: what about DNSSEC failure? */
2554 goto out;
2555 }
2556
2557 for (name = ISC_LIST_HEAD(rev->answerlist); name != NULL;
2558 name = ISC_LIST_NEXT(name, link)) {
2559 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
2560 rdataset != NULL;
2561 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link)) {
2562 if (dns_rdataset_isassociated(rdataset) &&
2563 rdataset->type == dns_rdatatype_soa)
2564 break;
2565 }
2566 }
2567
2568 if (rdataset == NULL) {
2569 /* Drop one label and retry resolution. */
2570 nlabels = dns_name_countlabels(&uctx->soaqname);
2571 if (nlabels == 1) {
2572 result = DNS_R_SERVFAIL; /* is there a better error? */
2573 goto out;
2574 }
2575 dns_name_init(&tname, NULL);
2576 dns_name_getlabelsequence(&uctx->soaqname, 1, nlabels - 1,
2577 &tname);
2578 dns_name_clone(&tname, &uctx->soaqname);
2579 resoptions = 0;
2580 if (uctx->want_tcp)
2581 resoptions |= DNS_CLIENTRESOPT_TCP;
2582
2583 result = dns_client_startresolve(uctx->client, &uctx->soaqname,
2584 uctx->rdclass,
2585 dns_rdatatype_soa,
2586 resoptions,
2587 uctx->client->task,
2588 resolvesoa_done, uctx,
2589 &uctx->restrans);
2590 } else
2591 result = process_soa(uctx, rdataset, &uctx->soaqname);
2592
2593 out:
2594 dns_client_freeresanswer(uctx->client, &rev->answerlist);
2595 isc_event_free(&event);
2596
2597 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2598 update_sendevent(uctx, result);
2599}
2600
2601static isc_result_t
2602copy_name(isc_mem_t *mctx, dns_message_t *msg, const dns_name_t *name,
2603 dns_name_t **newnamep)
2604{
2605 isc_result_t result;
2606 dns_name_t *newname = NULL;
2607 isc_region_t r;
2608 isc_buffer_t *namebuf = NULL, *rdatabuf = NULL;
2609 dns_rdatalist_t *rdatalist;
2610 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset, *newrdataset;
2611 dns_rdata_t rdata = DNS_RDATA_INIT, *newrdata;
2612
2613 result = dns_message_gettempname(msg, &newname);
2614 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2615 return (result);
2616 result = isc_buffer_allocate(mctx, &namebuf, DNS_NAME_MAXWIRE);
2617 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2618 goto fail;
2619 dns_name_init(newname, NULL);
2620 dns_name_setbuffer(newname, namebuf);
2621 dns_message_takebuffer(msg, &namebuf);
2622 result = dns_name_copy(name, newname, NULL);
2623 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2624 goto fail;
2625
2626 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list); rdataset != NULL;
2627 rdataset = ISC_LIST_NEXT(rdataset, link)) {
2628 rdatalist = NULL;
2629 result = dns_message_gettemprdatalist(msg, &rdatalist);
2630 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2631 goto fail;
2632 dns_rdatalist_init(rdatalist);
2633 rdatalist->type = rdataset->type;
2634 rdatalist->rdclass = rdataset->rdclass;
2635 rdatalist->covers = rdataset->covers;
2636 rdatalist->ttl = rdataset->ttl;
2637
2638 result = dns_rdataset_first(rdataset);
2639 while (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2640 dns_rdata_reset(&rdata);
2641 dns_rdataset_current(rdataset, &rdata);
2642
2643 newrdata = NULL;
2644 result = dns_message_gettemprdata(msg, &newrdata);
2645 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2646 goto fail;
2647 dns_rdata_toregion(&rdata, &r);
2648 rdatabuf = NULL;
2649 result = isc_buffer_allocate(mctx, &rdatabuf,
2650 r.length);
2651 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2652 goto fail;
2653 isc_buffer_putmem(rdatabuf, r.base, r.length);
2654 isc_buffer_usedregion(rdatabuf, &r);
2655 dns_rdata_init(newrdata);
2656 dns_rdata_fromregion(newrdata, rdata.rdclass,
2657 rdata.type, &r);
2658 newrdata->flags = rdata.flags;
2659
2660 ISC_LIST_APPEND(rdatalist->rdata, newrdata, link);
2661 dns_message_takebuffer(msg, &rdatabuf);
2662
2663 result = dns_rdataset_next(rdataset);
2664 }
2665
2666 newrdataset = NULL;
2667 result = dns_message_gettemprdataset(msg, &newrdataset);
2668 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2669 goto fail;
2670 dns_rdatalist_tordataset(rdatalist, newrdataset);
2671
2672 ISC_LIST_APPEND(newname->list, newrdataset, link);
2673 }
2674
2675 *newnamep = newname;
2676
2677 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
2678
2679 fail:
2680 dns_message_puttempname(msg, &newname);
2681
2682 return (result);
2683
2684}
2685
2686static void
2687internal_update_callback(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
2688 updatearg_t *uarg = event->ev_arg;
2689 dns_clientupdateevent_t *uev = (dns_clientupdateevent_t *)event;
2690
2691 UNUSED(task);
2692
2693 LOCK(&uarg->lock);
2694
2695 uarg->result = uev->result;
2696
2697 dns_client_destroyupdatetrans(&uarg->trans);
2698 isc_event_free(&event);
2699
2700 if (!uarg->canceled) {
2701 UNLOCK(&uarg->lock);
2702
2703 /* Exit from the internal event loop */
2704 isc_app_ctxsuspend(uarg->actx);
2705 } else {
2706 /*
2707 * We have already exited from the loop (due to some
2708 * unexpected event). Just clean the arg up.
2709 */
2710 UNLOCK(&uarg->lock);
2711 isc_mutex_destroy(&uarg->lock);
2712 isc_mem_put(uarg->client->mctx, uarg, sizeof(*uarg));
2713 }
2714}
2715
2716isc_result_t
2717dns_client_update(dns_client_t *client, dns_rdataclass_t rdclass,
2718 const dns_name_t *zonename, dns_namelist_t *prerequisites,
2719 dns_namelist_t *updates, isc_sockaddrlist_t *servers,
2720 dns_tsec_t *tsec, unsigned int options)
2721{
2722 isc_result_t result;
2723 isc_appctx_t *actx;
2724 updatearg_t *uarg;
2725
2726 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
2727
2728 if ((client->attributes & DNS_CLIENTATTR_OWNCTX) == 0 &&
2729 (options & DNS_CLIENTUPDOPT_ALLOWRUN) == 0) {
2730 /*
2731 * If the client is run under application's control, we need
2732 * to create a new running (sub)environment for this
2733 * particular update.
2734 */
2735 return (ISC_R_NOTIMPLEMENTED); /* XXXTBD */
2736 } else
2737 actx = client->actx;
2738
2739 uarg = isc_mem_get(client->mctx, sizeof(*uarg));
2740 if (uarg == NULL)
2741 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
2742
2743 isc_mutex_init(&uarg->lock);
2744
2745 uarg->actx = actx;
2746 uarg->client = client;
2747 uarg->result = ISC_R_FAILURE;
2748 uarg->trans = NULL;
2749 uarg->canceled = false;
2750
2751 result = dns_client_startupdate(client, rdclass, zonename,
2752 prerequisites, updates, servers,
2753 tsec, options, client->task,
2754 internal_update_callback, uarg,
2755 &uarg->trans);
2756 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
2757 isc_mutex_destroy(&uarg->lock);
2758 isc_mem_put(client->mctx, uarg, sizeof(*uarg));
2759 return (result);
2760 }
2761
2762 /*
2763 * Start internal event loop. It blocks until the entire process
2764 * is completed.
2765 */
2766 result = isc_app_ctxrun(actx);
2767
2768 LOCK(&uarg->lock);
2769 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS || result == ISC_R_SUSPEND)
2770 result = uarg->result;
2771
2772 if (uarg->trans != NULL) {
2773 /*
2774 * Unusual termination (perhaps due to signal). We need some
2775 * tricky cleanup process.
2776 */
2777 uarg->canceled = true;
2778 dns_client_cancelupdate(uarg->trans);
2779
2780 UNLOCK(&uarg->lock);
2781
2782 /* uarg will be freed in the event handler. */
2783 } else {
2784 UNLOCK(&uarg->lock);
2785
2786 isc_mutex_destroy(&uarg->lock);
2787 isc_mem_put(client->mctx, uarg, sizeof(*uarg));
2788 }
2789
2790 return (result);
2791}
2792
2793static void
2794startupdate(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
2795 updatectx_t *uctx;
2796 isc_result_t result;
2797 unsigned int resoptions;
2798
2799 REQUIRE(event != NULL);
2800
2801 UNUSED(task);
2802
2803 uctx = event->ev_arg;
2804
2805 if (uctx->zonename != NULL && uctx->currentserver != NULL) {
2806 result = send_update(uctx);
2807 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2808 goto fail;
2809 } else if (uctx->currentserver != NULL) {
2810 result = request_soa(uctx);
2811 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2812 goto fail;
2813 } else {
2814 resoptions = 0;
2815 if (uctx->want_tcp)
2816 resoptions |= DNS_CLIENTRESOPT_TCP;
2817 dns_name_clone(uctx->firstname, &uctx->soaqname);
2818 result = dns_client_startresolve(uctx->client, &uctx->soaqname,
2819 uctx->rdclass,
2820 dns_rdatatype_soa, resoptions,
2821 uctx->client->task,
2822 resolvesoa_done, uctx,
2823 &uctx->restrans);
2824 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2825 goto fail;
2826 }
2827
2828 isc_event_free(&event);
2829
2830fail:
2831 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2832 update_sendevent(uctx, result);
2833}
2834
2835isc_result_t
2836dns_client_startupdate(dns_client_t *client, dns_rdataclass_t rdclass,
2837 const dns_name_t *zonename,
2838 dns_namelist_t *prerequisites,
2839 dns_namelist_t *updates, isc_sockaddrlist_t *servers,
2840 dns_tsec_t *tsec, unsigned int options,
2841 isc_task_t *task, isc_taskaction_t action, void *arg,
2842 dns_clientupdatetrans_t **transp)
2843{
2844 dns_view_t *view = NULL;
2845 isc_result_t result;
2846 dns_name_t *name, *newname;
2847 updatectx_t *uctx;
2848 isc_task_t *tclone = NULL;
2849 dns_section_t section = DNS_SECTION_UPDATE;
2850 isc_sockaddr_t *server, *sa = NULL;
2851 dns_tsectype_t tsectype = dns_tsectype_none;
2852 bool want_tcp;
2853
2854 UNUSED(options);
2855
2856 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
2857 REQUIRE(transp != NULL && *transp == NULL);
2858 REQUIRE(updates != NULL);
2859 REQUIRE(task != NULL);
2860
2861 if (tsec != NULL) {
2862 tsectype = dns_tsec_gettype(tsec);
2863 if (tsectype != dns_tsectype_tsig)
2864 return (ISC_R_NOTIMPLEMENTED); /* XXX */
2865 }
2866
2867 LOCK(&client->lock);
2868 result = dns_viewlist_find(&client->viewlist, DNS_CLIENTVIEW_NAME,
2869 rdclass, &view);
2870 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
2871 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2872 return (result);
2873
2874 want_tcp = ((options & DNS_CLIENTUPDOPT_TCP) != 0);
2875
2876 /*
2877 * Create a context and prepare some resources.
2878 */
2879
2880 uctx = isc_mem_get(client->mctx, sizeof(*uctx));
2881 if (uctx == NULL) {
2882 dns_view_detach(&view);
2883 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
2884 }
2885
2886 isc_mutex_init(&uctx->lock);
2887
2888 tclone = NULL;
2889 isc_task_attach(task, &tclone);
2890 uctx->client = client;
2891 ISC_LINK_INIT(uctx, link);
2892 uctx->state = dns_clientupdatestate_prepare;
2893 uctx->view = view;
2894 uctx->rdclass = rdclass;
2895 uctx->canceled = false;
2896 uctx->updatemsg = NULL;
2897 uctx->soaquery = NULL;
2898 uctx->updatereq = NULL;
2899 uctx->restrans = NULL;
2900 uctx->restrans2 = NULL;
2901 uctx->bp4 = NULL;
2902 uctx->bp6 = NULL;
2903 uctx->soareq = NULL;
2904 uctx->event = NULL;
2905 uctx->tsigkey = NULL;
2906 uctx->sig0key = NULL;
2907 uctx->zonename = NULL;
2908 uctx->want_tcp = want_tcp;
2909 dns_name_init(&uctx->soaqname, NULL);
2910 ISC_LIST_INIT(uctx->servers);
2911 uctx->nservers = 0;
2912 uctx->currentserver = NULL;
2913 dns_fixedname_init(&uctx->zonefname);
2914 if (tsec != NULL)
2915 dns_tsec_getkey(tsec, &uctx->tsigkey);
2916 uctx->event = (dns_clientupdateevent_t *)
2917 isc_event_allocate(client->mctx, tclone, DNS_EVENT_UPDATEDONE,
2918 action, arg, sizeof(*uctx->event));
2919 if (uctx->event == NULL)
2920 goto fail;
2921 if (zonename != NULL) {
2922 uctx->zonename = dns_fixedname_name(&uctx->zonefname);
2923 result = dns_name_copy(zonename, uctx->zonename, NULL);
2924 }
2925 if (servers != NULL) {
2926 for (server = ISC_LIST_HEAD(*servers);
2927 server != NULL;
2928 server = ISC_LIST_NEXT(server, link)) {
2929 sa = isc_mem_get(client->mctx, sizeof(*sa));
2930 if (sa == NULL)
2931 goto fail;
2932 sa->type = server->type;
2933 sa->length = server->length;
2934 ISC_LINK_INIT(sa, link);
2935 ISC_LIST_APPEND(uctx->servers, sa, link);
2936 if (uctx->currentserver == NULL)
2937 uctx->currentserver = sa;
2938 uctx->nservers++;
2939 }
2940 }
2941
2942 /* Make update message */
2943 result = dns_message_create(client->mctx, DNS_MESSAGE_INTENTRENDER,
2944 &uctx->updatemsg);
2945 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2946 goto fail;
2947 uctx->updatemsg->opcode = dns_opcode_update;
2948
2949 if (prerequisites != NULL) {
2950 for (name = ISC_LIST_HEAD(*prerequisites); name != NULL;
2951 name = ISC_LIST_NEXT(name, link)) {
2952 newname = NULL;
2953 result = copy_name(client->mctx, uctx->updatemsg,
2954 name, &newname);
2955 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2956 goto fail;
2957 dns_message_addname(uctx->updatemsg, newname,
2958 DNS_SECTION_PREREQUISITE);
2959 }
2960 }
2961
2962 for (name = ISC_LIST_HEAD(*updates); name != NULL;
2963 name = ISC_LIST_NEXT(name, link)) {
2964 newname = NULL;
2965 result = copy_name(client->mctx, uctx->updatemsg, name,
2966 &newname);
2967 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2968 goto fail;
2969 dns_message_addname(uctx->updatemsg, newname,
2970 DNS_SECTION_UPDATE);
2971 }
2972
2973 uctx->firstname = NULL;
2974 result = dns_message_firstname(uctx->updatemsg, section);
2975 if (result == ISC_R_NOMORE) {
2976 section = DNS_SECTION_PREREQUISITE;
2977 result = dns_message_firstname(uctx->updatemsg, section);
2978 }
2979 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
2980 goto fail;
2981 dns_message_currentname(uctx->updatemsg, section, &uctx->firstname);
2982
2983 uctx->magic = UCTX_MAGIC;
2984
2985 LOCK(&client->lock);
2986 ISC_LIST_APPEND(client->updatectxs, uctx, link);
2987 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
2988
2989 *transp = (dns_clientupdatetrans_t *)uctx;
2990 result = isc_app_ctxonrun(client->actx, client->mctx, client->task,
2991 startupdate, uctx);
2992 if (result == ISC_R_ALREADYRUNNING) {
2993 isc_event_t *event;
2994 event = isc_event_allocate(client->mctx, dns_client_startupdate,
2995 DNS_EVENT_STARTUPDATE, startupdate,
2996 uctx, sizeof(*event));
2997 if (event != NULL) {
2998 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
2999 isc_task_send(task, &event);
3000 } else
3001 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
3002 }
3003 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
3004 return (result);
3005 *transp = NULL;
3006
3007 fail:
3008 if (ISC_LINK_LINKED(uctx, link)) {
3009 LOCK(&client->lock);
3010 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(client->updatectxs, uctx, link);
3011 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
3012 }
3013 if (uctx->updatemsg != NULL)
3014 dns_message_destroy(&uctx->updatemsg);
3015 while ((sa = ISC_LIST_HEAD(uctx->servers)) != NULL) {
3016 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(uctx->servers, sa, link);
3017 isc_mem_put(client->mctx, sa, sizeof(*sa));
3018 }
3019 if (uctx->event != NULL)
3020 isc_event_free(ISC_EVENT_PTR(&uctx->event));
3021 if (uctx->tsigkey != NULL)
3022 dns_tsigkey_detach(&uctx->tsigkey);
3023 isc_task_detach(&tclone);
3024 isc_mutex_destroy(&uctx->lock);
3025 uctx->magic = 0;
3026 isc_mem_put(client->mctx, uctx, sizeof(*uctx));
3027 dns_view_detach(&view);
3028
3029 return (result);
3030}
3031
3032void
3033dns_client_cancelupdate(dns_clientupdatetrans_t *trans) {
3034 updatectx_t *uctx;
3035
3036 REQUIRE(trans != NULL);
3037 uctx = (updatectx_t *)trans;
3038 REQUIRE(UCTX_VALID(uctx));
3039
3040 LOCK(&uctx->lock);
3041
3042 if (!uctx->canceled) {
3043 uctx->canceled = true;
3044 if (uctx->updatereq != NULL)
3045 dns_request_cancel(uctx->updatereq);
3046 if (uctx->soareq != NULL)
3047 dns_request_cancel(uctx->soareq);
3048 if (uctx->restrans != NULL)
3049 dns_client_cancelresolve(uctx->restrans);
3050 if (uctx->restrans2 != NULL)
3051 dns_client_cancelresolve(uctx->restrans2);
3052 }
3053
3054 UNLOCK(&uctx->lock);
3055}
3056
3057void
3058dns_client_destroyupdatetrans(dns_clientupdatetrans_t **transp) {
3059 updatectx_t *uctx;
3060 isc_mem_t *mctx;
3061 dns_client_t *client;
3062 bool need_destroyclient = false;
3063 isc_sockaddr_t *sa;
3064
3065 REQUIRE(transp != NULL);
3066 uctx = (updatectx_t *)*transp;
3067 REQUIRE(UCTX_VALID(uctx));
3068 client = uctx->client;
3069 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
3070 REQUIRE(uctx->updatereq == NULL && uctx->updatemsg == NULL &&
3071 uctx->soareq == NULL && uctx->soaquery == NULL &&
3072 uctx->event == NULL && uctx->tsigkey == NULL &&
3073 uctx->sig0key == NULL);
3074
3075 mctx = client->mctx;
3076 dns_view_detach(&uctx->view);
3077 while ((sa = ISC_LIST_HEAD(uctx->servers)) != NULL) {
3078 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(uctx->servers, sa, link);
3079 isc_mem_put(mctx, sa, sizeof(*sa));
3080 }
3081
3082 LOCK(&client->lock);
3083
3084 INSIST(ISC_LINK_LINKED(uctx, link));
3085 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(client->updatectxs, uctx, link);
3086
3087 if (client->references == 0 && ISC_LIST_EMPTY(client->resctxs) &&
3088 ISC_LIST_EMPTY(client->reqctxs) &&
3089 ISC_LIST_EMPTY(client->updatectxs))
3090 need_destroyclient = true;
3091
3092 UNLOCK(&client->lock);
3093
3094 isc_mutex_destroy(&uctx->lock);
3095 uctx->magic = 0;
3096
3097 isc_mem_put(mctx, uctx, sizeof(*uctx));
3098
3099 if (need_destroyclient)
3100 destroyclient(&client);
3101
3102 *transp = NULL;
3103}
