3105isc_mem_t *
3106dns_client_mctx(dns_client_t *client) {
3107
3108 REQUIRE(DNS_CLIENT_VALID(client));
3109 return (client->mctx);
3110}
3111
3112typedef struct {
3113 isc_buffer_t buffer;
3114 dns_rdataset_t rdataset;
3115 dns_rdatalist_t rdatalist;
3116 dns_rdata_t rdata;
3117 size_t size;
3118 isc_mem_t * mctx;
3119 unsigned char data[FLEXIBLE_ARRAY_MEMBER];
3120} dns_client_updaterec_t;
3121
3122isc_result_t
3123dns_client_updaterec(dns_client_updateop_t op, const dns_name_t *owner,
3124 dns_rdatatype_t type, dns_rdata_t *source,
3125 dns_ttl_t ttl, dns_name_t *target,
3126 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset, dns_rdatalist_t *rdatalist,
3127 dns_rdata_t *rdata, isc_mem_t *mctx)
3128{
3129 dns_client_updaterec_t *updaterec = NULL;
3130 size_t size = offsetof(dns_client_updaterec_t, data);
3131
3132 REQUIRE(op < updateop_max);
3133 REQUIRE(owner != NULL);
3134 REQUIRE((rdataset != NULL && rdatalist != NULL && rdata != NULL) ||
3135 (rdataset == NULL && rdatalist == NULL && rdata == NULL &&
3136 mctx != NULL));
3137 if (op == updateop_add)
3138 REQUIRE(source != NULL);
3139 if (source != NULL) {
3140 REQUIRE(source->type == type);
3141 REQUIRE(op == updateop_add || op == updateop_delete ||
3142 op == updateop_exist);
3143 }
3144
3145 size += owner->length;
3146 if (source != NULL)
3147 size += source->length;
3148
3149 if (rdataset == NULL) {
3150 updaterec = isc_mem_get(mctx, size);
3151 if (updaterec == NULL)
3152 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
3153 rdataset = &updaterec->rdataset;
3154 rdatalist = &updaterec->rdatalist;
3155 rdata = &updaterec->rdata;
3156 dns_rdataset_init(rdataset);
3157 dns_rdatalist_init(&updaterec->rdatalist);
3158 dns_rdata_init(&updaterec->rdata);
3159 isc_buffer_init(&updaterec->buffer, updaterec->data,
3160 (unsigned int)
3161 (size -
3162 offsetof(dns_client_updaterec_t, data)));
3163 dns_name_copy(owner, target, &updaterec->buffer);
3164 if (source != NULL) {
3165 isc_region_t r;
3166 dns_rdata_clone(source, rdata);
3167 dns_rdata_toregion(rdata, &r);
3168 rdata->data = isc_buffer_used(&updaterec->buffer);
3169 isc_buffer_copyregion(&updaterec->buffer, &r);
3170 }
3171 updaterec->mctx = NULL;
3172 isc_mem_attach(mctx, &updaterec->mctx);
3173 } else if (source != NULL)
3174 dns_rdata_clone(source, rdata);
3175
3176 switch (op) {
3177 case updateop_add:
3178 break;
3179 case updateop_delete:
3180 if (source != NULL) {
3181 ttl = 0;
3182 dns_rdata_makedelete(rdata);
3183 } else
3184 dns_rdata_deleterrset(rdata, type);
3185 break;
3186 case updateop_notexist:
3187 dns_rdata_notexist(rdata, type);
3188 break;
3189 case updateop_exist:
3190 if (source == NULL) {
3191 ttl = 0;
3192 dns_rdata_exists(rdata, type);
3193 }
3194 case updateop_none:
3195 break;
3196 default:
3197 INSIST(0);
3198 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
3199 }
3200
3201 rdatalist->type = rdata->type;
3202 rdatalist->rdclass = rdata->rdclass;
3203 if (source != NULL) {
3204 rdatalist->covers = dns_rdata_covers(rdata);
3205 rdatalist->ttl = ttl;
3206 }
3207 ISC_LIST_APPEND(rdatalist->rdata, rdata, link);
3208 dns_rdatalist_tordataset(rdatalist, rdataset);
3209 ISC_LIST_APPEND(target->list, rdataset, link);
3210 if (updaterec != NULL) {
3211 target->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_HASUPDATEREC;
3212 dns_name_setbuffer(target, &updaterec->buffer);
3213 }
3214 if (op == updateop_add || op == updateop_delete)
3215 target->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_UPDATE;
3216 else
3217 target->attributes |= DNS_NAMEATTR_PREREQUISITE;
3218 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
3219}
3220
3221void
3222dns_client_freeupdate(dns_name_t **namep) {
3223 dns_client_updaterec_t *updaterec;
3224 dns_rdatalist_t *rdatalist;
3225 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
3226 dns_rdata_t *rdata;
3227 dns_name_t *name;
3228
3229 REQUIRE(namep != NULL && *namep != NULL);
3230
3231 name = *namep;
3232 for (rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list);
3233 rdataset != NULL;
3234 rdataset = ISC_LIST_HEAD(name->list)) {
3235 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(name->list, rdataset, link);
3236 rdatalist = NULL;
3237 dns_rdatalist_fromrdataset(rdataset, &rdatalist);
3238 if (rdatalist == NULL) {
3239 dns_rdataset_disassociate(rdataset);
3240 continue;
3241 }
3242 for (rdata = ISC_LIST_HEAD(rdatalist->rdata);
3243 rdata != NULL;
3244 rdata = ISC_LIST_HEAD(rdatalist->rdata))
3245 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(rdatalist->rdata, rdata, link);
3246 dns_rdataset_disassociate(rdataset);
3247 }
3248
3249 if ((name->attributes & DNS_NAMEATTR_HASUPDATEREC) != 0) {
3250 updaterec = (dns_client_updaterec_t *)name->buffer;
3251 INSIST(updaterec != NULL);
3252 isc_mem_putanddetach(&updaterec->mctx, updaterec,
3253 updaterec->size);
3254 *namep = NULL;
3255 }
3256}
